description: This beach is very special. There’s a way to turn around here, and space for like 4 vans. Beautiful and super quiet place. Nothing but nature around you. Enjoy…

name: Valcarce Los Oteros Restaurant Gas Station
description: Very nice gas station with free hot showers. Ask for the key at the counter of the bar. I was going to leave the id and they asked me to buy something on the way back. I had just a espresso afterwards, and all good.

name: Clearing by the river
description:
Seems to be a fairly infrequently used track leading to a flat clearing in the trees right by a river. Moto or 4x4 only.
Beautiful spot to cool off or have a wash.

name: Ramales Camping
description: Nice small camping on a hill with lots of shade. Clean ablutions and a good restaurant

name: Camping La Paz
description:
Phantastic campsite, overlooking the beach and the sea. The different sites are terrassed. You need to come early or to make a reservation. 
Phone/Fax: 34 - 985 41 12 35
Good restaurant/bar 
Internet only at the bar

name: Camping Playa de Isla
description:
Mid-size campground ( approx. 160 sites for tents and camping cars) on a hill overlooking the sea.  The campground has little shade. The ablutions are extremely clean and new. Tel. + 34 942 679 361
www.playadeisla.com //. onfo@playadeisla.com

name: As Leiriñas
description: An amazing place! A hot spring in outdoor pool next to the lake. There is also a lot of space for pitching the tent and parking for campers...

name: Camping & Bungalows Leagi
description: Nice campground overlooking the sea. Toilets and showers clean. Campground open from March 1st until October 31st; restaurant and pool only open in high season.

name: Barceloneta beach
description: you can rest in the beach in summer. bathrooms and showers nearby. many people sleep there and the benches next to the beach

name: Vilarello
description:
River bath with cold showers and some water taps. next to the place is a service installation for campervan to empty toilets and refill fresh water.
There is a playground for kids and some picnic tables + benches. 
very quiet out of season. in season not sure how crowded it is.
the bar is closed (we were here in October).
nice view to the river. 
(4G+)

name: Termal Bath
description:
new thermal bath near the river. it seems not fully built, but it's nice.
cold and hot shower. different pools with different temperatures. 
the railway nearby is ok. we counted only 6 trains in 24h.
open whole year. (For opening hours, check the pictures.) 
parking area a bit higher up with the dirty ground but it's better. it's more leveled and not so busy during the day when the bath is open.
Toilets and shower available when the bath is open. A water tap is located in the "park" after the bridge, behind the wooden fence.

name: Dolmen de pedra gentil
description:
Parking place voor walking tracks 
In the bush. Dirt road well exassable.

name: Restaurante Venta Del Peral Hotel.
description: Service área: hotel, restaurant, gas station. parking also for caravans.

name: Camping Almundia
description: Nice small campground, well equipped. Not at all places Shadow - the trees are still growing. Swimmingpool nearby.

name: Parque público "El Picón"
description: This is a big picnic area in an open forest next to the river (where you also go swimming). There are no facilities around except a water tap and many tables.

name: La Redondela
description:
Very nice picnicplace with benches along the Via Verde del Litoral with one big experienced pinetree that brings some shadow. Every morning the shepperd comes by (twice) and he is in the mood for a chat. Directly next to the small town at 200mts where all you want or need is available. No free watertaps but bottles in the mercados at €0,40 per liter.

Attention : do not cycle the Via Verde del Litoral from Redondela to Gibraleon vv since it is in a very bad condition.

name: Cataya cemetery
description:
Opposite of the Cataya cemetery (at 2 kms east) along a local gravelroad. Not a very nice spot but Cataya offers no better. Nothing available here, however there might be water and toilets at the cemetery but that was closed for a full two weeks. There might be a better spot just some 500mts further east behind the cafe along the mainroad. 

Attention : do not cycle the Via Verde del Litoral from Redondela to Gibraleon vv since it is in a very bad condition.

name: Gibraleon riverside
description:
Very nice area along the river and the Via Verde del Litoral with a bridge helping you to cycle or walk into Gibraleon. There you will find all you want or need.

Attention : do not cycle the Via Verde del Litoral from Redondela to Gibraleon vv since it is in a very bad condition.

name: Valverde del Camino cemetery
description: At the tarmac next to the cemetery. Nice spot, friendly people, water and toilets available during the day. The town is just 5 minutes away where you will find all you want or need.

name: sant gervas
description: Nice bushcamp in the catalan pirinees. Mountan views and some horses around. Need a 4x4 to arrive here.

name: Rest area on top of the hill
description: Nice area to camp with beaches and sunbeds (in concrete) but most important a water tap!

name: The Molinar
description: It’s a front beach parking area, there is an open gym and a lot of amenities for van travelers.  It’s very close from the shopping mall FAN, palm International Airport and more.

name: Night Parking in Jerez de la Frontera
description:
Quiet night parking. Free.
Just parking please don't show off...so others can continue stopping without problems with neighbours or police.

Levelled surface, many places near public pool (or a like)

name: Pared de Roberto
description: Vivac site up in the mountain, close to Roque de Los Muchachos. Amazing views of La Caldera de Taburiente National Park. Be careful in wintertime the temperatures could be under -10° C.

name: Propper Velley camp
description:
Nice quiet campground. 
picknick tables
Shelter with fire place (just not a lot of wood around)
trinking water
trash bin
shaddow in summer
good mobile signal

name: Montserat by the river
description: Between a quiet road and the river.  Also a train bridge but really not that loud.  Epic view ov the Montserat mountains!  Another camper was here and a fisherman came in the morning.  We could hear wolves howling at the moon in a distance.  A M A Z I N G

name: Camping Los Limoneros
description: Campsite from a local farmer. 6 Pits. No Facility or something else. A small walk (300m) trough the wood to beach. Great for Dogowners.

name: Finca Colores
description:
Peaceful private dog-friendly estate with a cottage
Malaga and Montes de Malaga Natural Park 30 minutes driving
Barbecues are allowed; shops and restaurants within 15 min drive
This dog-friendly property is in a great location for outdoor adventures and reconnecting with nature: golden-sand beaches, hiking mountains, gorges, waterfalls, and historic landmarks await within a half hour's drive.
A tranquil atmosphere reigns in this private estate that rises 700 meters above sea level.

Espanol
Finca privada tranquila que admite perros con una casa de campo
Málaga y Parque Natural Montes de Málaga a 30 min conduciendo
Se permiten las barbacoas; tiendas y restaurantes a 15 min conduciendo.
Finca Colores es justo lo que estabas buscando. Este establecimiento admite perros y tiene una ubicación estupenda para emprender aventuras al aire libre y reconectarse con la naturaleza: a eso de media hora conduciendo te esperan playas de arena dorada, montañas en las que practicar senderismo, desfiladeros, cascadas y lugares de interés histórico.
Una atmósfera tranquila reina en esta finca privada que se alza a 700 metros por encima del nivel del mar.

name: picnic area
description: perfect spot I travel by bicycle w a tent there are 2 tables, no benches....the a bench alone and a fountain w water!!! you c hear a few cars but they don't see you. no one comes at night.4km from Linares.

name: behind little church w water
description:
Possibly no vehicle access

This is a great spot. With the little church (ermita) on your right, go straight down a rocky path . There is a small spring w running water and beautiful sunset

name: Playa de los covachos
description: Open field at the top of a cliff overlooking covachos beach. Great for setting up a tent, car, or van.

name: nice wood for the tend close to a lake
description: this is a nice spot for take a rest with the tend or van is very chill, is close to the highway

name: Santacara
description:
Motorhome area with services to empty and fill tanks 

Área de autocaravanas con servicios para vaciar y llenar depósitos

name: Riba de Saelices
description: Small and quiet picnic site by the river with drinking water,  tables and a small shelter one kilometer from the village. Good for one night camping if you are passing by walking or cycling. There is no space to park a vehicle.

name: Camping El Bierzo
description: Quite small and private place with approx. 50 places mostly shady. Nice personal, very polite.

name: Embarcadero de piraguas
description: Great place to relax for a week.  The driveway is easy to find and possible with any vehicle.  Good access to the river with clean water.  Nobody bothers you here. everything clean. From time to time bathers come, everybody is friendly.

name: water
description: Good drinking water, roadside fountain, A little behind the helipad

name: On a big rock
description: Nice area with a good view of the Aragon. better to have a 4x4 to come here. Very quiet.

name: Lakeside de Castrejón
description: Follow small road down on the left side of picknick-benches. Small campground accessible for all cars. Next to the water. View on scenic rock-formation de Castrejón.

name: embalse de la garganta del prior
description: Is a nice quiet place near the lake. Only accessible by bike or walking. You will only be able to hear wildlife overnight, to enter try to follow Google maps towards the Torre de botafuegos.

name: San Nicolas de Bujaruelo
description:
Beautiful area at the top of a mountain road. Flat grass field surrounded by mountain peaks. The starting point of many hiking trails. There's a refugio with good food! Cooling down after the hike in the beautiful clear water ice cold river, that passes under an ancient river, is a must.

The road up the mountain was challenging for our big rig (7,5m long, 2,5m wide, 3,75m high) but doable. The refugio also gets its delivery by trucks..

name: Between the cows
description: 4x4 necessary for reaching open space next to the road

name: Asolaze Camping Izaba
description: Great place in the mountains with ca. 30 pitches in between big trees. Friendly personnel. We paid 25€ for car, tent and two adults. I recommend this site

name: Camping Solopuent
description: Camping Place with fixed huts and ca. 25 pitches for tents/campers. Flat ground near to river with clean WC, hot shower and pool. Polite personnel. We paid 26€ for car/tent/two persons. I recommend this site.

name: Antiguo Parador de Jaizkibel
description: The parking is located on the crest of the Jaizkibel mountain next to the ruins of what was the parador of Jaizkibel. The place is called Santa Barbara. Very close to the parking there is an excellent viewpoint with incredible views. Near the parking, about fifty meters, there is a mountain route, quite busy that runs along the ridge of the mountain but there should be no noise problems. At night it is a very quiet area. The access road is good so that a caravan can access perfectly.

name: Juan Adalid
description: Former cropland in the very north of the island. Garafía. Very windy place but really beautiful and with natural pools everywhere.

name: La Pobla de Segur
description:
Municipal parking lot for 12 motorhomes next to the train station. First train in the morning arrives at 7am.

Petrol station, supermarket, restaurants and swimming pool just around the corner. 

Electricity (2€) and water available. No toilets!

It's ok for one night.

name: Nice and quiet place near a chapel
description:
A parking near a little chapel, very quiet and secluded.
A fountain at disposal near the chapel.
We didn't know if we could settle a tent but as there was no sign we tried anyway.

name: Àrea d'autocaravanes Pla d'Ermita
description:
Parking Lot next to a holiday village. No shade in the evening. Nice views. Restaurants, picnic spot with large barbecue and a water fountain nearby.
At the moment there's a porta-potty.

name: Faro de Higuer Kanpina
description:
Quiet place at the base of the Lighthouse, pedestrian passage for the path that goes towards the cliff. to reach it there is a very sloping dirt road to the left of the Lighthouse
----
Posto tranquillo alla base del Faro, passaggio pedonale per il sentiero che va verso la scogliera. per raggiungerlo c'è una stradina sterrata molto in pendenza alla sinistra del Faro.

name: Repsol gasstation, laundry and water
description: At this gasstation, just next to the highway, you can wash and dry your laundry in a few externally places laundromats. There's also 2 water filling points.

name: vall de can masdeu
description: awsome place in Barcelona to spend some nights and days. the comunity of can masdeu its running a farm over a large, old building. you can stay near the farm, colaborating whit they comunnity whit work.

name: Parking near beach
description: Parking close to the beach. Opposite Bar Cafetaria Alhmar.

name: Parking O Castro Mountain
description: quiet place in vigo in the nice little mountain of o'castro. autocaravans and vans sleeping. there are stone tables near and nice views of the city. the best place to sleep near vigo center.

name: Out of use resting area
description: Some level spots to pitch a tent a bit beneath the road. Good place for cyclists or hikers. Mind the torns.

name: Along the river
description:
Nice place near the river, a little track on the right of the main road will lead you to the place by the river.
If you have a 4x4 car you can even cross the river by the bridge and go up 50 meters, there is a nice spot by the forest where you can set the tent.

name: Parque del molino
description: Parking lot. Waste disposal for caravans. Picnic tables. Drinking water. Quiet places to camp. Nice place a few kilometers from the village

name: San Marco
description: Nice flat place close to the lake, near asphalt road.

name: El bosc de la Pope
description:
if you wanna arrive at this place, once you reach the closest fork on the main road, take the path that has the “iturrieta” sign. it would lead to a wildroad with little spots throughout the way. it is perfect to put up tents, not valid for vans. there aren’t any facilities, only forest 

att: MM <3

name: Refugio de Gallegos (Gallegos mountain shelter)
description: Little building without door. Is just a 10 sq meters place with a chimney placed in a spectacular place where you can enjoy the sunset surrounded by pine trees.

name: beach
description: beach parking 2wd or 4wd 8 km from main road,bring everything with you & pack it out.super quiet at night and no light pollution.bins on site.weak phone signal.resturant open june to september 500m.

name: oasis hollywood & zoo
description: take the road into car park, theres motorhome parking for 2.90€  a day or continue on road past zoo into mountains on a rough gravel/tarmac road many pull ins,not problem for 2wd but watch out for flash floods when raining. Good phone signal.

name: montego
description: parking around a lake,great for swimming and paddle boarding.no services except bins.

name: presa de proserpina(lake/dam)
description:
parking around a lake with beach & resturant,set in pine trees used by locals since roman times.
footpath/cycle track 9 km around lake which is lit up all night.
sup & peddalo hire.

name: Tremp
description: Fresh Water filling point and water dump site next to the fire fighter station.

name: CASECHA
description:
Farm Area "CASECHA" ideal for family trips or simply to rest in a unique rural environment, to enjoy in the middle of nature. Large plots, with access to electricity, sale of products from the garden.
---
Area Granja "CASECHA" ideal para viajes en familia o simplemente para descansar en un entorno rural único, para disfrutar en plena naturaleza.
Grandes parcelas, con acceso a luz, venta de productos de la huerta.

name: Horcadas
description: Between main road and lake. You'll need to open cow gate to enter. Seems private but there is no house, just a small water-checking station in the back. Also for bigger rigs closer to the road. Further down more private space for vans.

name: parkinglot next to the landing fiel of paragliding
description: asphaltet parking lot right next to the paragliding landingfield of the town to hike uf to the launch it takes you one hour. water available at a fountain in the little village. nice taberna at the end of the street

name: playa arnia
description: climbing spor with 6 vias. nice restaurant beside. possible to park in front. there is a beach beside with nice cliffs in the water.

name: Wild camp near Berga
description: Just a quiet place in the mountain to sleep one night, this is not a place for several days camping. Space for several trucks or campers. Pets are happy here!

name: torimbia parking lot
description: huge parking field on top of the torimbia playa. next to the take off for paragliding. very nice place...quite and a lot of space...the street to get there is quite narrow but with a mercedes sprinter was ok. camping car maybe bit tricky to get there.

name: AC parking La Brisa
description: Guarded area for motorhomes from 9:00 to 21:00 with toilet, shower, drinking water, WiFi and discharge area for sewage and grey water. Overnight stay allowed.

name: Campervan Area, Agreda
description:
Moderator Note: wrong location, next traveler, please Update to correct coordinates and delete this my note.

Sorry, the location is a little off but Agreda provide a wonderful camping area for canpervans and tents. Yes, tents!! A couple of km outside of town, grass to pitch on, bathrooms with hot water. An oasis for cyclists and other self propelled travellers. The are seems to be on the edge of a public park with picnic tables and a small, simple bar and restaurant.

name: Cueva de las Palomas
description: Awesome spot with lots of space for tents, campervans, bicycles and motorbikes. some picnic tables, water and bathrooms. picnic tables and bbq area. Free, close to waterfall.

name: Arija
description: Open parking spot on the side of the lake. plenty of space to park over night with your camper

name: FREE campsite at parque national Hunde
description: awesome, chill spot with showers, toilets, a bbq place, picnic tables and a fuente. all free. some trails around. super quiet. 4G

name: Estacion Meteorologica del Pico Aguion
description:
Stunning views of the coast next to the weather station of Pico Aguión.
Fairly easy access via a forest track.
.....
Impresionantes vistas de la costa junto a la estación meteorológica del Pico Aguión.
Acceso bastante fácil a través de una pista forestal.

name: Banana museum!
description: Interesting little museum and outside exhibits /rooms including a small banana plantation. 5 euros entrance fee which includes a free banana, a free taste of banana wine and liquor! Go on, treat yourself

name: Viacamp
description:
new Place for Campervan on tar ground. trees and Rose bushes separate the sites. 
Good Place for a Overnight Stay.

name: Astorga Place for Motorhomes
description:
Free parking space for Womos at the bullfighting arena. A bit from the center but ok for the night.
---
Kostenloser Stellplatz für Womos bei der Stierkampfarena. Etwas vom Zentrum aber ok für die Nacht.

name: Playa
description: We did not stay here, but a lot of spanish campers did. There is a sign to register and states €6,50/ per day

name: Cabanas de Virtus
description: Known kitesurf spot and beautiful lake site wild camping spot. Make sure to keep all gates closed for the cattle not to run away.

name: River Campsite
description:
Quit spot next to the river. Plenty of space for tents and campers.
Easy access to the river, but there are crabs, so pay attention to your tippy toes ;)

The nearby bridge is blocked for cars on both ends by big rocks (can be passed by bikes), cars can use the road starting at the roundabout (leaving it in 9 o'clock position) northeast of the spot.

name: O Muino
description: camping with sites on the shore. cleen Place with all facilities you need. Friendly welcome. Big Rigs over 7 Meter may have Problems to use this Place.

name: Refugio Zamorano
description: Recreational area close to the mountain. there are toilets and water available. also showers but at the moment I write, it was closed.

name: Berrocal del Rugidero plarkplatz
description: Small parking in a quiet and beautiful surrounding, inside a nice Natural Park. You can get off-road in 100 m. to get more wild (take care in Spain usually is not allowed get off-road). Low 4G coberture in this area.

name: Parking de Autocaravanas Palomera „free“
description:
Big new place, for about 40 motorhomes.
Drinking water, sanitation dump station!
And for all dog lovers, near this place is a dog area

name: CAMPER AREA for CampersVan
description: Agreda Village offers a very nice place to.camp. FOR FREE. Shaded and calm place. Dumping station. At walking distance from town center. Supermarkwts available  Interesting old village

name: Porta de Barcelona thieves
description:
You will probably be allowed to stop for the night with your camper or even put up a tent at the service station at Porta de Barcelona - but do not attempt it alone, unless you are prepared to stay awake all night! Groups of thieves drive around attempting to break into the parking trucks, you always need someone awake to watch out for them here!
We were warned by gas station staff when asking for permission to camp, and I saw thieves myself while keeping watch. Seeing me awake, they didn't approach our tents, but steering clear of the area at night might be the best option.

name: Gorbea - Pagomakurre
description: Car Park & Picnic & Fontaine in a forest. Starting area for interesting hiking

name: Hidden place nect to waterstream
description: Perfect place, not too much space so only for normal size rigs or motorcycles with tents. Fits two or three campers but a big rigs wouldn't be able to reach, small road. Right next to water stream, you will cross it just before reaching. Some nearby houses, i talked to one of them and they seemed friendly. Quite near to those houses though so might wanna keep volume down.

name: Former church
description: Amazing place with a shelter to spend a night or two

name: Villa El Destino
description:
Villa El Destino offers 3 holiday apartments each with 2 bedrooms, bath room, kitchen, living room and private terrace.
Shared areas are the outdoor pool and large terraces.
Secure parking, small workshop, Wi-Fi.

name: Villa El Destino
description: Motorbike-friendly holiday rentals with secure parking, workshop, 3 apartments, Pool, BBQ. Close to beach and city.

name: wildcamp near boca de huergano
description: very big wild camp with a lot of place very plane and quiet, near of the river. alone and for naturelovers ! to find the place you have to take the stone path that starts at the church "ermita de santo Tirso" near from the village of Boca de huergano.

name: quiet place near salamanca
description:
Quiet place despite the proximity of the city.  Passage in the evening because along a path, despite the situation of the railway line, no trains during the night and only one in the evening.  Large concrete space so flat and stable, no services.  Only drawback, impossible to use the water from the river (inaccessible and dirty).
---
Endroit calme malgré la proximité de la ville. Du passage en soirée car le long d'un chemin de balade, malgré la situation de la voie de chemin de fer, pas de trains durant la nuit et un seul en soirée. Grand espace bétonné donc plan et stable, pas de services. Seul inconvénient, impossible d'utiliser l'eau de la rivière (inaccessible et sale).

Lugar tranquilo a pesar de la cercanía de la ciudad.  Paso de tarde porque por un camino, a pesar de la situación de la vía férrea, no hay trenes durante la noche y sólo uno por la tarde.  Gran espacio de concreto tan plano y estable, sin servicios.  Único inconveniente, imposibilidad de utilizar el agua del río (inaccesible y sucia).

name: laundry in Leclerc
description:
laundry inside Leclerc, washing €4 for 10kg and €7 for 20kg, drying from €2

laverie a l'intérieur de Leclerc, lavage 4€ pour 10kg et 7€ pour 20kg, séchage a partir de 2€

lavandería dentro de Leclerc, lavado 4€ por 10kg y 7€ por 20kg, secado desde 2€

name: Olivenza lake
description:
Parking under trees by the lake, good for swimming.
Access road bumpy and maybe muddy after rain but no problem in 2wd van.
No bins so, take your trash with you. Keep it clean

name: Pont romain
description:
Very good place, natural and quiet place, plan to park easily.  Impossible however to remove the noise of the highway, but that does not prevent from sleeping.  Unfortunately a lot of rubbish, especially cigarette butts, on the ground.

Tres bon endroit, lieu nature et tranquille, plan pour stationner facilement. Impossible cependant d'enlever le bruit de l'autoroute mais ça n'empêche pas de dormir. Malheureusement beaucoup de détritus, notamment de mégots par terre.

Muy buen lugar, lugar natural y tranquilo, plan para estacionar facilmente.  Imposible sin embargo quitar el ruido de la carretera pero eso no impide dormir.  Desafortunadamente, mucha basura, especialmente colillas de cigarrillos en el suelo.

name: abandoned house
description: An abandoned house with porch for rainy days, space inside and with a fireplace

name: los olivos
description:
We didn't sleep there but there is enough parking to spend the night.  it is a roadside hotel and restaurant.  You can eat a lot of food there for cheap, and very good!  We stopped to take a shower there (3 euros) -- the water is cold and the color of rust and old pipes but it does the job.  the boss is really nice!  a good place to cut the road!

Nous n'y avons pas dormi mais il y a suffisamment de parkings pour passer la nuit. c'est un hôtel et restaurant routier. On y mange de belles quantité pour pas cher, et très bien !  Nous nous sommes arrêtées pour y prendre une douche (3 euros) -- l'eau est froide et a la couleur de la rouille et des vieilles canalisations mais ça fait le job. le patron est vraiment sympa ! un bon endroit pour couper la route !

No dormimos allí pero hay suficiente estacionamiento para pasar la noche.  es un hotel y restaurante de carretera.  Puedes comer mucha comida allí por poco dinero, ¡y muy buena!  Nos detuvimos para ducharnos allí (3 euros), el agua está fría y tiene el color del óxido y las tuberías viejas, pero cumple su función.  el jefe es muy agradable!  un buen lugar para cortar el camino!

name: embalse de Proserpina
description:
Full nature spot at the edge of the reservoir, Roman dam and lake tour to stroll, bird watching. You will not be alone, it is a place very frequented by fishermen, sports but after dark, there is no longer a noise and the space is huge so you will not be glued to possible other travelers. Superb sunrise over the lake. Plan and shaded parking spaces! accessible motorhome depending on the location. Water points and beach showers a hundred meters behind the buildings.
---
Spot pleine nature au bord de la retenue d'eau, barrage romain et tour de lac pour se balader, observation d'oiseaux. vous ne serez pas seuls, c'est un endroit très fréquenté par les pêcheurs, sportifs mais une fois la nuit tombée, il n'y a plus un bruit et l'espace est immense donc vous ne serez pas collés aux éventuels autres voyageurs. lever de soleil superbe sur le lac. espaces de stationnement plans et ombragés ! accessibles camping car selon les endroits. points d'eau et douches de plages à une centaine de mètres derrière les bâtiments.  
---
Lugar de la naturaleza completa al borde del embalse, la presa romana y el lago para pasear, observar aves. No estarás solo, es un lugar muy frecuentado por pescadores, deportes, pero después del anochecer, ya no hay un ruido y el espacio es enorme, por lo que no estarás pegado a posibles otros viajeros. Excelente amanecer sobre el lago. Plan y espacios de estacionamiento sombreados! Automóvil accesible dependiendo de la ubicación. Puntos de agua y duchas de playa a cien metros detrás de los edificios.

name: Hotel La Allandesa
description: Fine place to pass the night. Comfortable, clean and cheap. The food in their restaurant is amazing and people is very nice. Very recommendable

name: Malavella
description: Great campspot for one or two nights. reasonable flat. The road (solid gravel) is quite bumpy and has some grooves in it because of heavy rainfall. Great for motorcycle and Vans. road can be narrow sometimes so not suited for bigger rigs or campers. i drove up here with my Renault Master(L3H2). until sunset some hikers and mountainbikes pass by. that's it.

name: Ermitage nuestra senora de valme
description:
Quiet place but full of trash.  We cleaned up around us.  Off the passage with people who come to walk their dog.  To spend the night close to Seville, it does the trick.  We chose this place because it is shady, and it is not trivial with the heat it is here.  Nearby bus or metro to Montejunto, accessible in 10 minutes.  No services, trash cans nearby.

Lieu calme mais plein de déchets. nous avons nettoyé autour de nous. du passage avec des gens qui viennent balader leur chien. pour passer la nuit proche de Séville, ça fait l'affaire. nous avons choisi ce lieu car ombragé et ce n'est pas anodin avec la chaleur qu'il fait ici. bus a proximité ou métro a montequinto accessible en 10 minutes. pas de services, poubelles a proximité.

Lugar tranquilo pero lleno de basura.  limpiamos a nuestro alrededor.  del pasaje con gente que viene a pasear a su perro.  para pasar la noche cerca de Sevilla, funciona.  Elegimos este lugar porque tiene sombra y no es baladí con el calor que hace aquí.  cercano bus o metro a montequinto accesible en 10 minutos.  sin servicios, papeleras cercanas.

name: Mountain-spot overlooking Vigo
description: Beautiful spot on top of the mountain overlooking Vigo. Sunset not over the city but from the side over another mountain but still beautiful. Rough dirttrack to reach, seems to be a populat MTB/hiking trail although no signs at all in terms of vehicles or camping not allowed. Small 4x4’s with some clearance will make it, other than that only for motorcycles with comfortable offroad skills, or hiking/biking obviously. Good 4g signal, surprisingly not windy (maybe i was lucky), no mosquitoes or people after sunset. Very quiet.

name: Taller ilegal
description: Great motorcycle mechanic that spoke good english and were able to get me new sprockets for my Honda Transalp from afternoon until the morning next day while the big official Honda mechanics couldn’t and said it would take until next week. He also had time to install them as soon as they arrived compared to waiting a full day for chain replacement that the Honda place had in stock.  Nobody at the Honda place even spoke English so I highly recommend this place instead. Looks a bit sketchy but it was gold.

name: Pena el Aguila
description: Mountain with many places and Ruger forest to do hiking and wild camping, have a lot of mineral fountain water and street and paths.

name: water fountain cecerdilla mountain
description: Water fountain cecerdilla mountain up the red way.

name: Sous le pont!
description:
Difficult to find a place out of sight in this corner of Extreme...

The solution: under the bridge!

Easy access, roughly flat land for 2 or 3 vehicles.

It makes a little noise when a car passes but there is so little! ...

Very nice environment!

Very good 4G
——-
Difficile de trouver un endroit à l’abri des regards dans ce coin d’Extremadure… 
La solution: sous le pont!
Accès facile, terrain à peu près plat pour 2 ou 3 véhicules.
Cela fait un peu de bruit quand une voiture passe mais il en passe tellement peu!…
Très joli environnement!
Très bonne 4G

name: Camping in a picnic area
description: Established picnic area, parking is also available for campers. I put my tent in the middle of everything, people saw me (not too many tho as it was a little late) but only smiles and waves. Picnic tables, fireplaces and a river flowing through. Very quiet at night.

name: Merendero Legutio
description:
Quiet place by the lake. Enough space for several vehicles with a beautiful sunset.
BBQs, tables and bins available.

name: Villa del Rey
description: Free water and dump station at the gas station.

name: Gaset
description: Friendly Quiet camping situated on the bank of a freshwater dam.

name: Border Spain - Morocco
description: Exiting Spain you need to drive around to Avenida da la Frontera del Chino to get to the border. There are signs showing the way, although they are easy to miss. I arrived very early with the ferry (around 05:30) and there was already a very long line. Then it took at least 4 hours to actually get to border. After that it’s a straight forward and easy border crossing, just expect some waiting.

name: Taller Miramarc
description:
It is a Workshop specialized in Campers, motorhomes and 4x4. They are efficient and very good professionals. The Boss is Marc and he has maintained my vehicles for over 10 years.   
--
Es un taller especializado en campers, autocaravanas y 4x4. Son eficientes y muy buenos profesionales. El jefe se llama Marc y mantiene mis vehículos desde hace más de 10 años.

name: Meandro del Melero
description: Beauty spot right beside a river, access road is rough but passable with care, ideal location for 4x4’s and Overland trucks. Respect the area, keep it tidy!

name: Meandro del Melero view point
description: carry on past the view point to a large turning area at the end of the concrete road. Stunning views, wildlife etc and nice walks through the woods.

name: Santomera, Murcia
description:
Wild camp 
Tent and motorcycle ( Honda Africa Twin)
No problems 
Spot cose to highway

name: Embalse de guadalen
description:
Huge picnic area at the edge of the water reservoir.  A few flat, shady places, space large enough to be quiet and away from others.  No services but nature and calm!  Unfortunately waste everywhere but it's not the worst place we've seen so far in Spain. Good signal.

Immense aire de pique-nique au bord de la retenue d'eau. Quelques endroits plats, ombragés, espace assez grand pour être tranquilles et éloignés des autres. Pas de services mais nature et calme ! Malheureusement des déchets un peu partout mais ce n'est pas le pire endroit que nous ayons pu voir pour autant en Espagne. Bon réseau téléphonique.

Enorme área de picnic al borde del embalse de agua.  Unos pocos lugares llanos y sombreados, espacio lo suficientemente grande para estar tranquilo y alejado de los demás.  Sin servicios pero con naturaleza y tranquilidad! Desgraciadamente desperdicio por todos lados pero no es el peor sitio que hemos visto hasta ahora en España. buen signal por el teléfono.

name: área recreativa de Burguillos, Bailén
description:
Parking within a natural area and converted into a picnic area.  some shaded areas in the car park, much more at the tables (accessible only on foot).  Drinking water fountain and barbecues available.  Very quiet, clean and protected area, to keep as it is!

Parking au sein d'une zone naturelle et aménagée en aire de pique-nique. quelques espaces ombragés sur le parking, beaucoup plus au niveau des tables (accessibles seulement à pied). Fontaine d'eau potable et barbecues à disposition. Zone très calme, propre et protégée, à garder en l'état ! 

Aparcamiento dentro de un espacio natural y reconvertido en merendero.  algunas zonas de sombra en el aparcamiento, mucho más en las mesas (accesible sólo a pie).  Fuente de agua potable y barbacoas disponibles.  Zona muy tranquila, limpia y protegida, para mantener como está!

name: Motorhome Area (near camping el sur)
description:
This is an area reserved for motorhomes or vans.  It is managed by the campsite, but is necessarily much cheaper.  Very clean, with a hot shower and a men's toilet and the same for women, a space to do the dishes as well, electricity if necessary as well as everything necessary for emptying and filling the camper van.
  Price: 16 euros all inclusive.
  Good telephone signal, a few shady pitches, quiet and a very short distance from Ronda (accessible on foot and by bike).

Esta es una zona reservada para autocaravanas o autocaravanas.  está gestionado por el camping pero es necesariamente mucho más barato.  muy limpio, con ducha de agua caliente y baño de hombres y mujeres lo mismo, espacio para lavar los platos también, electricidad si es necesario así como todo lo necesario para vaciar y llenar la furgoneta camper.
 Precio: 16 euros todo incluido.
 Buena señal de teléfono, algunas parcelas con sombra, tranquila ya muy poca distancia de Ronda (accesible a pie y en bicicleta).

C'est une aire réservée aux camping car ou autocaravanes. elle est gérée par le camping mais est forcément beaucoup moins cher. très propre, avec une douche chaude et un WC homme et idem pour les femmes, un espace pour faire la vaisselle également, l'électricité si besoin ainsi que tout le nécessaire pour vidange et remplissage du camping car. 
Prix :16 euros tout inclus.
Bon signal téléphonique, quelques emplacements ombragés, au calme et à très courte distance de Ronda (accessible à pieds et à vélo).

name: Nice spot
description: A little spot around what appears to be an old building, not used anymore. The paver road ends here and splits into two tracks, both of which are probably not suitable for cars. I parked and camped right at the convergence of these paths. At around 6PM a lone mountain biker came by but otherwise no one else. Very nice views of both the mountains and the sea close by, as well as nice hiking place. Only downside is a lot of noice from planes at night, probably airport close by.

name: Camping La Tancada
description:
It is a campsite that is in the middle of the Ebro River Delta. Ideal as a base for excursions and bird watching.  All the services, but it is not very luxurious.  Restaurant with typical food from the Delta, special in rice dishes.

Es un camping que está en medio del Delta del río Ebro. Ideal como base para hacer excursiones y observar aves. Todos los servicios, pero no es muy lujoso. Restaurante con comida típica del Delta, especial en arroces.

name: Road to Douro River
description: Water Fountain near the road of Douro River.

name: Castejon de SOS
description: Nice place in a non-paved parking place close to the Village. Restaurants and supermarket very close, in the Village. Beautiful view of the Mountain and relaxed night hearing the bell from the nearby church. Paradise for Mountain bikers with lot of approved trails.

name: Aire de camping-car, great view!
description: It‘s a parking for caravans with electricity, water, etc. Costs 15€/night. Wifi avaiable at the front. You can stay for 24h. The best thing is, that you have a great view over Bilbao! And you can reach Bilbao by bus, the bus station is 1-2 min away from the parking lot and comes every 20 min.

name: Camping in forests above river
description: Nice forest to hang a hammock, lots of availability for multiple hammocks. No reliable cell phone signal, about 8 miles into the trail from nearest town (Manzanares el Real). Next to a river so water is readily available (with filter). Beautiful views of sunset and sunrise over the ridge.

name: Camping on hillside above Yaiza
description: Hills with ample space for tent camping (no hammocks) right above the town Yaiza. Perfect for camping near Timanfaya National Park without illegally entering. Gets rather dewey at night so prepare accordingly. Good cell phone signal and close to a supermercado with food and water. Beautiful stargazing at night.

name: Beach camping
description: Space for camping within small dunes near parking lot. There was multiple motorhomes camping in the parking lot nearby so I felt comfortable. Reliable cell phone signal. Beautiful spot to sleep on the sand with the sound of the ocean. About an hour walk from Playa Blanca.

name: parking dinopolis
description:
dinopolis car park, much quieter than the motorhome area located 200m away.  at the end of the parking lot, only walkers and walkers passing by.  roadside but more noise after 10 p.m.  no service on site but the motorhome area being next door and free, you can go there to drain and fill the water if necessary. Auchan store at the other end of the car park as well as Mac Donald's it is therefore possible to find toilets there during opening hours (Auchan 9am-10pm non stop)

parking de dinopolis, beaucoup plus calme que l'aire de camping-car située à 200m. en bout de parking, seulement des marcheurs et promeneurs qui passent. bord de route mais plus un bruit après 22h. pas de service sur place mais l'aire de camping car étant à côté et gratuite, vous pouvez y aller vidanger et remplir l'eau si besoin. magasin Auchan à l'autre bout du parking ainsi que mac Donald's il est donc possible d'y trouver des WC aux heures d'ouverture (Auchan 9am-10pm non stop)

parking dinopolis, mucho más tranquilo que la zona de autocaravanas situada a 200m.  al final del estacionamiento, solo pasan caminantes y caminantes.  en la carretera pero más ruido después de las 10 p.m.  no hay servicio en el lugar, pero el área de autocaravanas está al lado y es gratuita, puede ir allí para drenar y llenar el agua si es necesario. La tienda Auchan en el otro extremo del estacionamiento, así como Mac Donald's, por lo tanto, es posible encontrar baños allí durante el horario de apertura (Auchan de 9 a.m. a 10 p.m. sin parar)

name: Gotor
description:
Next to a very quiet dustroad. 
No facilities.
Great view iver the valley and Gotor.

name: Parking Estacion Teruel
description:
Free parking in open air (so height of your car is not a problem). Also overnight parking but no camping.
According to spokesman of the hotel where we stayed in, this parking is a safe place. 
Good light during the evening/night. Only few steps away from city center.

name: Canjayar dump and water
description: Free dumpstation with water too. Several sign to find this place

name: Casas Altas
description: Next to very quiet dustroad at entry point of agricultural land with olive trees.

name: Las Negras
description: We stayed in the street. There are a few small parking lots but only for vans/small rv's. 100 m from the sea and a lot off restaurants are open even in the winter. No problem for overnight at all

name: AC La Granja d’Escarp
description:
Municipal motorhome area, 8 seats on completely flat asphalt.  The overnight stay is free.  Water costs €1 and can be used for half an hour.  Electricity is paid with tokens, which can be bought in the town's bars and at the Town Hall, each token is worth €2 and is for 12 hours.  Access from the town is fully signposted.

Área de Autocaravanas municipal, 8 plazas en asfalto totalmente llanas. La pernocta es gratis. El agua cuesta 1€ y se puede utilizar durante media hora. La electricidad se paga con fichas, que se pueden comprar en los bares del pueblo y en el Ayuntamiento, cada ficha vale 2€ y es para 12 horas. 
El acceso está totalmente señalizado.

name: Great view
description: Flat gravel place for few campers. Great overview and hiking trails

name: near from Alcubillas
description: A very lonly place on end of the track. beautifull view.

name: Estación abandonada de Santa Quiteria
description:
Abandoned railway station far from any population center.
The Vía Verde de la Jara ends there.
There are several abandoned buildings, tables and a large esplanade where you can spend the night.
---
Estación de ferrocarril abandonada lejos de ningún núcleo de poblacion.
Allí termina la Vía Verde de la Jara.
Hay varios edificios abandonados, mesas y una gran explanada donde pernoctar.

name: Parking Castillo Fuengirola
description: Car park, nothing on site re amenities, next to the castle, 30 meters to the sea.

name: AC de Calamocha
description:
Motorhome area, 16 completely flat seats, gravel floor.  The overnight stay costs €12 with electricity, if you do not use electricity €10.  The water is free. 
Everything is booked and managed online, including payment, which is made with credit card details.  There is no shade and it is on the outskirts of the town of Calamocha.

Área de Autocaravanas, 16 plazas  totalmente llanas, suelo de grava. La pernocta cuesta 12€ con electricidad, si no usas electricidad 10€. El agua es gratis.
Se reserva y se gestiona todo por internet, también el pago, que se hace con los datos de una tarjeta de crédito. No hay sombra y está en las afueras del pueblo de Calamocha.

name: Aparcamiento y mirador - van camping spot
description: Where everyone and their nan parks their vans to sleep. Absolutely no issues parking here, great scenes.

name: Jimera de Libar
description: Jimera de Libar town station area. Nice small area, brand new. Fit about seven motorhomes.  Ideal for the routes of the Artezuelas, the mills and the plain. There is a shop in the station and a bar. Great for rural tourism. Let’s keep this nice and clean.

name: Old Bull fight place
description: We could stay one night. Good place close to a small sport park. Just in front of the last house of the Village. Fresh water available. Very calm place. Supermarket and coffee bar in the village.

name: Rijana Beach
description: Off the secondary road, a small parking lot for the beach below. When I visited it was empty. No flat surface.

name: Casa Los Lobos
description: One of the best places we have been. Kevin & Mimi the owner are very helpful. You can also eat here and you have every service you need. The price is 13€ for a camper and 2 person incl. electric.

name: Baix Pirineu
description: very nice restaurant, good service and good price for local food. bon profit!!

name: Refugio Forestal Tentetieso
description:
building in the middle of nature near the municipality of Samboal.
It only has a table, seats and a fireplace, frequented by hunters.

name: Dumpstation Logrosan
description: Dumpstation for toilet and black water with fresh water available

name: Baleària Ceuta - Algeciras
description:
Here is a ferry connecting Ceuta to Algeciras 93 Euros for 2 people + motorcycle.

Its Spain to Spain , so no Visas required, and very simple entry and exit.

name: Border Ceuta - Morocco (BUSY)
description:
Very busy border entering Morocco, thank god we were by Motorcycle and skipped most of the traffic, still very slow processing, lots of checking and found our drone, they wanted to take it away but we refused , so went back to ship it to Spain and back to the border again! 

https://youtu.be/YegG2NxYCMM

name: High over Albaicín
description: Car park looking Alhambra and the old quarter Albaicín. No facilities. Reasonably level.

name: Autocaravanas Viña Castilla
description: Campsite and Caravan Park, situated at the base of the Alpujarra mountain range, ideal for hiking, biking, and off roading (4x4 and motorbikes). 10 € for night

name: Next to the beach
description: Great parking lot direct to the beach. Bike path to the old town and several restaurants on the boulevard. Drinking water and cold shower. No problem for parking in the winter months. Stayed here with 10 other vans

name: quiet place to sleep
description: with a good view and very good mobile link.

name: free water and sewage
description: free parking space very clean except electricity everything is available

name: Matalascañas
description: Car park on edge of town with access to a National Park and beach. Popular with overlanders/van lifers.

name: gergal
description: Nice point of vue at the end of a rough road. 4x4 only

name: Lake Negratin
description: Nice wild place in front Lake Negratin. Great place to go to Gorafe the day after. 4x4 only

name: camping Las Corralizas
description: Good campsite to have a rest before or after visiting Albarracin

name: CAMPER PARK CAÑADA REAL
description: A newly established caravan park south of Seville. Easily accessible via a short dirt road. Space for about 30 vehicles with electric available. Good solid ground and clean facilities. Owner offers a lift to the local railway station for a small fee, perfect for a day exploring Seville.

name: Fonte de Malvas
description:
Drinking spring water, I drink it frequently.
--------------
Agua potable de manantial, la consumo con frecuencia

name: Abandoned House
description:
Perfect place to spend the night. Very quite.
--
perfecto lugar para pasar la noche, todo tranquilo

name: ponderosa
description: nice place to camp near a river with place fire pit  and potable water

name: parking
description:
Translation : ideal for visiting the city.We slept there one night
a lot of space, no service

idéal pour visiter la ville
nous y avons dormi une nuit
beaucoup d espace
pas de service

name: camping
description:
a motorhome, two adults and a child 29 euros
wifi bad
clean sanitary
sandy pitch, bad in case of rain
children's play area
---
un camping car, deux adultes et un enfant 29 euros 
wifi mauvais 
sanitaire propre 
emplacement sable, mauvais en cas de pluie
aire de jeux enfants

name: La Palma del Condado
description: Motorhome service area (Area de servicio de autocaravanas). Lots of places with water and dump station.

name: 24/7 Gas Station.
description: Free parking where you can spend the night. not too much to see around, but it has free water and a dump station for gray and black water. right in the center of the city.  WC and 24/7 gas station nearby.

name: Aracena
description: Big flat gravel grassy place with lots of campers. Few hundred meters to very nice old town with lot of restaurants. Don't forget to visit the gaves in the center and castle you see from this "camping". Lidl supermarkt in town too.

name: Batería de las Chapas
description: Flat parking close to the sea. Good access (tarmac). There is a restaurant close and also a small black beach (Playa del Lastre). Also close to a small fishing port. Town is aprox 5km away. Very quiet. From here you can make some hiking as well. Good phone reception also for internet (4G)

name: Great place in town
description: Free campsite in small town. Max 72 hours, water, electra, dump all free!! Restaurants in town

name: Constitution at C Francisco I Madero.
description: Level Street parking beside parking lot, on the north east side facing the shore. Good quiet and safe neighborhood with security agent stationed kiddy corner for a bank. Numerous restaurants and close to Malexon.

name: Area de Autocaravanas Riopar
description: Service area for campers. With dumpstation and water. You walk straight into the town with shopping and restaurants close by.

name: Area de Autocaravanes de Umbrete
description: Official place near town. Free dump and water. Great place to spent the night . Restaurants walking distance

name: Free AC Parking
description: New caravan park in Canet lo Roig. Cozy town, with different routes through ancient olive trees, hiking, mountain biking, parks for children, municipal swimming pool in summer and various services such as shops, bakeries and restaurants. The parking lot has drinking water and a water changer.

name: Open Blue
description: Laundry € 3.- Dryer € 2.- open 7:00-22:00 7 days a week. Last washing cycle to start at 21:00.

name: La Casita
description: A super camping in the forest. all the facilities! superb.

name: Nice campground near lake
description:
in this little town you can go to the lake at the end of an asphalt road.  
really easy to camp during winter (not sure in summer). lot of places with huts and bench to eat and have a pic nic. no sound or light at this Time of year. 
there is probably a parking around the lake to Park a van

name: Plata de Capicorb
description: a very large place with many possibilities to stay overnight

name: Public Parking, 03700 Denia
description: Great place for visiting the town of Denia. Quiet at night. Supermarket 5 mins walk away. Town approx 10 mins walk. lots of shops, cafes, restaurants and bars. The castle is worth a visit, great views.

name: Asador la Chumbera
description:
In low season, you can sleep at the parkinglot of the restaurant, if you consume something.
Really nice people, good food and understand English…

name: Carrozados y Evoluciones del Motor S.L
description: Preparation and repair of expedition, camper, 4x4, and competition vehicles

name: Carrozados y Evoluciones del Motor
description: Area to park a guarded vehicle, it is a workshop for expedition, 4x4, camper and competition vehicles.

name: Cyclist wildcamp spot.
description: Wildcamp spot for cyclist right next to the national road. Nothing special but wildcamp spots are hard to find along the road here. Nobody see‘s you behind the bushes, not much noise from freeway thanks to big hill in between, just the N-road where traffic gets less in the evening. Might need to get bike and bags up separately as it’s steep up to get behind bushes. 2 km away from supermarkets.

name: Nice place to cook and picknick
description: Really beautiful place to walk. No sleeping possible, but nice place to cook and picknick :)

name: La Estacion
description: A good place from the Sea for sleeping. Double room 40€, hot water, Speed wifi and secure parking for bikes and motorbikes. Caffetteria Is good for rating something. in front of the beach.

name: Wild camping spot for tents/campervans
description: nice place with a lot of space for campers and some green areas for tents. No water

name: spring with drinking water
description: spring with drinking water. not so much flow

name: Cepsa
description: Site very close to Oceanographic and spend the night in a motorhome at a Cepsa gas station.  Very calm.  Gas station closes at 10:00 p.m. and turns off the lighting.  There is a small supermarket in gas station.

name: Area de Picnic
description: there are several picnic areas next to the river where you can camp easily with benches and tables. seems to be protected. Probably busy during summer.

name: Los Colores del Nigreu
description:
Spectacular place 200m from a forest track, that you can reach with any vehicle.
Good coverage. There lives a couple, who can help you with everything, even with meals or transportation. Charming.
You can camp or sleep in a little house made of precious glass bottles.
It is a magical place surrounded by mountains, in a nature reserve...
On clear days you can even see the sea...
sunrises, sunsets and starry nights that you will never forget...
Silent walks, ancient forests.....
I'll come back for sure
.....
Lugar espectacular a 200m de una pista forestal, hasta donde se puede llegar con cualquier vehículo.
Buena cobertura.
Ahí vive una pareja, que te ayudan con todo, incluso con comidas o transportes. Encantadores.
Se puede acampar o dormir en una casita hecha de botellas de vidrio preciosa.
Es un lugar mágico rodeado de montañas, en una reserva natural...
en días despejados incluso se ve el mar...
amaneceres atardeceres y noches estrelladas que no olvidaras nunca...
paseos silenciosos, bosques milenarios.....
volvere seguro

name: Los Colores del Nigreu
description:
Spectacular place 200m from a forest track. Good coverage.
There lives a couple, who help you with everything, even with meals or transportation. Charming.
You can camp or sleep in a little house made of precious glass bottles.
It is a magical place surrounded by mountains, in a nature reserve...
On clear days you can even see the sea...
sunrises, sunsets and starry nights that you will never forget...
Silent walks, ancient forests.....
I'll come back for sure
.....
Lugar espectacular a 200m de una pista forestal, hasta donde se puede llegar con cualquier vehículo.
Buena cobertura.
Ahí vive una pareja, que te ayudan con todo, incluso con comidas o transportes. Encantadores.
Se puede acampar o dormir en una casita hecha de botellas de vidrio preciosa.
