en días despejados incluso se ve el mar...
amaneceres atardeceres y noches estrelladas que no olvidaras nunca...
paseos silenciosos, bosques milenarios.....
volvere seguro

name: Guadalmina River Camp
description:
Went driving in the mountains and found this beautiful spot along the river. At some points the road is pretty narrow and you will need a vehicle with clearance to do this track. 4x4 is not necessary but makes it easier. The track starts from the white gate and then just follow the road along the river. 

Some hikers walked by but pretty quiet on the Saturday so you’ll be alone with some nice hikes around.

name: Gran Circo Wonderland (temporarily closed)
description: You can park for free on the site or in the streets around it. It's very quiet. You can stay for hours or days, but with the windows closed.

name: Wild Camping Beyond El Toro
description:
Simple spot popular with folks in vans or motor homes, located a couple hundred metres from el Toro. 
The beach is fairly rocky and full of sea urchins, but you have a wonderful sunset view (at least in the wintertime). I arrived by bike, so I am not sure how a camper van could get down there. 
I slept in a bivvy among the bushes ~100 m east of the campers. The bushes offered nice wind protection.

name: Central Box Trasteros - Self Storage
description: Perfect place for storage of all kinds. Professional and friendly operators.

name: Tarifa
description: Large dirt carpark.. No services. Quite level. No shade

name: Cova es Fontanelles
description:
Prehistoric cave with pre-Roman cave paintings
---------------
Grotte préhistoriques avec des peintures rupestres pré-romaine

name: Bushes near ocean
description: Quait place for night or two. A lot caravans and overlanders.

name: water
description:
Plaza Iglesia, Rooster in the Wall. good drinking water from the municipal administration
--
Plaza Iglesia, Hahn in der Wand. gutes Trinkwasser der Gemeindeleitung

name: No name
description: Ample free informal parking to spend the day or night. It is very common to see several parked motorhomes. No services. There is a supermarket nearby. There is a bike lane.

name: Camping Fisterra
description:
Basic camping sites in town, overlooking the ocean.   8€/night.   Water, dump and electric available for 3€.
Friendly owner.

name: Former stone quarry just above La Loja
description:
A former stone quarry which is now a meeting point for the youth. There are two picknick tables, a BBQ station (with the grill missing) and two unofficial fire places. Lots of small stones everywhere but it was no problem for our tent.
Surprisingly quiet for being super close to the highway.
You can arrive either from East via the gas station of the highway or from the West via a steep way directly from the village. (West is shorter from bikes and by foot, but might be difficult for some cars)

name: Parking near Roman aqueduct
description: Parking where the hiking path starts to the Roman aqueduct

name: Camping Valleniza Playa
description: Nice campground on the sea.   Many long term campers but several short term sites.   Friendly, clean.  €22 two people with campervan.

name: Sierra Nieves
description: a totally lost place surrounded by mountains, olive trees and will fennel all around. no cell coverage.

name: Parking area beside the ocean
description: Grass area by the sea.   Space for a dozen campers.   Beside Isla Campground.   We arrived to find them closed.

name: Rio Guadalquivir
description: great place right on the river with a lot of space

name: After hiking parking
description: Next place afte hiking parking to moutains. Very quait, good road, toilets in parkig lots. Just for night cross highway or walking.

name: Las Negras
description: Parking near City Center, max 6 RV‘s not longer than 7 mtrs, Restaurants in the city nearby.

name: Alpandeire
description: In the village you get drinking water from a tap. Easy to access with a van.

name: Area de Servicio para Autocaravanas Montilla
description: Free. Located in the center of the town is a service area and a parking area for 7 motorhomes. In the park nearby are public restrooms with opening hours. Restaurants and Fast Food you can find in the city (5 to 10 mins walk).

name: parque casa de campo
description: Very large park with multiple sites for overnight, campervan parking. Free and near the Lago metro stop. Several restaurants and cafés nearby with restrooms. Nice, quiet, and well lit.

name: next to the river Guadalete
description: Grassy in the middle of the rocky hill. We spend a quiet night here with 5 cars and two little tents, however room for many more. I do not know if it is allowed to set up tents here, but the neighbors were super friendly.

name: ila de gracia
description: just left after the only bridge. Flat and protected from wind. campfire possible, two vehicles max.

name: Forest Cul de sac
description:
spectacular and quiet area. you can get there following gmaps indications.
No phone signal. wild animals at night, beside river bed.

name: Horatio - ordutegia casa de banos
description: laundry and shower in Pamplona...parking outside will be tricky

name: another lakeside camp
description:
one of many lake side camps. access road is 4x4 and tight, but easier than a couple of the other nearby options.

camped at the high waterline mark. options will be more limited when reservoir is fuller. 

quite spot but a bit of road noise and some cover is given by the tree line unless wind off off the reservoir.

name: Biker Garage
description:
Good shop for motorcycles in Jerez.
can do all types of bikes
Have the computer for new bikes
specialized in antique bikes: Ducati, BMW, and Triumph.


Ask Alejandro 
WhatsApp +34615423362 
Knock at the door if the door is close.

Speak Spanish and English.
Top service!

name: Play de la franca
description: Flat rest area overlooking the beach. No water or waste.

name: Area Autocaravans and Picknick Area
description: Area for overnight stay with camper vans, camping possible at nearby park and Picknick Area, fresh water available, shelter for cooking in rainy conditions, beautiful river nearby, just outside of Espinosa

name: Area Autocaravans Balmaseda
description: area for overnight stay with camper vans, camping possible, fresh water available, toilets were locked - public toilets at train station (approx. 500m). situated next to a small river and below Balmaseda castle

name: Carrer de l’Escala, Gavà
description:
I have slept here tonight.  Very quiet place, there was also another motorhome.  The beach is only 20 meters away and there are showers with cold water.

He dormido aquí esta noche. Sitio muy tranquilo, había también otra autocaravana. La playa está a solo 20 metros y hay duchas con agua fría.

name: parque periurbano El Hecho
description: nice spot for a night on the via verde. there is water. it's a barbecue area so during week-ends it might be busy but during the week it is empty. please keep it clean

name: Sahara 4x4 / Jordi Cars
description: Good 4x4 mechanic that also sells parts online as www.sahara4x4.com

name: Mata Porqueres
description: Very professional workshop. Abel and his mechanics can do any kind of job at reasonable prices.

name: Escalerones perfect for camping
description: great place to camp between Jerte and Jarandilla. only place so far between the mountain.

name: Soroeta - Zona de Acampada Controlada
description:
Kind of a public campsite located near the hilltop, with fireplaces and benches for picknick, cows and horses around, no running water, no toilets, great views towards Irun and Hendaye

cyclists: It's a long and partly steep approach, but amazing and beautiful - make sure to drive and enjoy the whole GI-3454 street from Oiartzun to Irun.

name: Camping Los Escullos
description: Campground, 4 stars, but cheap in low season (9,90 euros for one motorbike and one tent for one person) with all facilities and very good base camp to discover Cabo de Gata and more in the countryside.

name: Miradoiro do Couso
description: A big place at a huge picnic spot. not far from the sea that has wonderfully beautiful and bizarre rock formations. there are also other good places right by the sea.

name: Orginal
description: Simple Campside south 2 km to Orgiva, grass and trees,

name: rocas sagradas
description:
Up to the mountain paved road until antennas and the sign "rocas sagradas" follow the offroad until a parking place and a wooden table where the offroad finishes. No forbidden signs of anything, just stayed with tent in a park place.
The offroad is only for dual purpose motorbikes or motos enduros with high clearance and four wheels drive.

name: spring with drinking water
description: spring with drinking water.                             .

name: Camping La Isla
description: Very nice and quiet (month of may) family driven camping site in the woods, near the reservoir „ Embalse de Iznajar“. Perfectly clean showers and toilets, little restaurant with homemade food, small pool area with sun beds. Some of the parcelas have view to over the reservoir.

name: CASA DOÑA ISABEL
description: Beautiful Andalusian manor house. Four bedrooms with private bathroom, swiming pool, patio. Space for bicycles

name: Place next to river
description: Nice spot, next to a river. Flat surface. Quiet. Drive to El Grado. A-138. Before crossing little river Barranco de los Ariños go right (just before the bridge). Then all the way to the end.

name: Mottila del Palanca
description:
On the outskirts of the village, parking area has about 15 pitches.
.....
Sehr nützlich am Rande des Dorfes, Parkanlage hat Stellplätze ca. 15. sehr viel Ruhe und positive Stimmung.
Danke

name: Las Minas
description: Great panorama, very peaceful and lonely! Right by the street.

name: Quiet spot in the forest
description: Small spot for 1 vehicle in the mountains near Serradilla, good for the night.

name: INOUT Hostel
description: Good option if you need safe parking, especially for motos. Relaxed hostel in nature but still just 30mins to downtown by train. Restaurant attached.

name: Camping Buchaca
description: Small basic site, tucked away in a sleepy village. Great location for tents and camper vans. Food and drink is available. Owners are very welcoming and friendly and speak good English. You are well looked after here!

name: Mariposa Libre
description: Lovely place with lovely owners! We ended up staying 5 nights, enjoying the site with its pool next to their finca, nice views and good talks. Marcel and Maybritte are excellent hosts, who make sure you feel at home. Visiting Malaga is easy: park your van safe and for free at Plaza Mayor, and take train to town center (15 min.). Would love to come back again.

name: Lavacolla Camper Park Santiago
description: A camperpark with all the facilities you need, including a small bar with a terrace. Tón is a lovely and helpfull host. Downtown Santiago de Compostella is only 20 minutes by public bus or 10 minutes by taxi. Also the perfect place to stall your van when you go walk the Camino.

name: MareView
description:
Translate: May is the right time before the season starts! 4 parking options very generous! Hiking trail by the sea!

Mai ist die richtige Zeit bevor die Saison beginnt! 4 Stellmöglichkeiten ganz großzügig! Wanderweg am Meer!

name: Mirador de Los Muros
description: Close to a small road with almost no passage. Great view on embase de la Cuerda del Mozo and the village of Abejar. Lots of space. Very quiet. Can be very windy. No trees for shade. Good 3G/4G signal.

name: Scenic view on Botaya
description: Close to a very small road with no passage. Great view on the mountains and the village of Botaya. Very quiet. Easy access. Flat spot for one big rig or two small vehicules. No trees for shadow. Good 3G/4G signal.

name: Camping La Zarapica
description: Very nice place. Open for a year. Nice people good food. Not  many people around. good voor dogs.  Great  walking .

name: Caleta de Caballo
description: Nice spot to park and sleep. Next to the see and usually other vans around.

name: Coll Verd Camping
description: Campsite is right next to the highway, you can hear the noise. Paid 11€ with just tent and bicycle in low season. Showers OK and clean, sinks for dishes but no kitchen.

name: Camping Los Pinos
description: Very nice with trees and direct beach access etc. WiFi exists but slow, 2mbit down / 0.5 up (but I only tested at the pitch). With only the bicycle, 1 night 25€ in low season, quite expensive for what it is.

name: Flats between olive trees
description: Small flat places for campervan, tent or 4x4. Just near the ruins. Perfect for a night an hour far from Barcelona.

name: Camping Lunada
description: Small shady campsite with flat grass pitches. Electric available. possible to take small camper vans. Also has a couple of Bungalows to rent. Lively cafe with good food, popular with the locals. Good basic facilities. Great location

name: Área CAMPING-CAR PARK de La Seu d'Urgell
description:
This is the location of the new payment area for motorhomes, which is a few meters from the previous one,

La Seu d'Urgell Camping Established Campground, is no longer operational, you can park in that area but there is no water or electricity, for these services you have to enter the new payment area

The new area is managed by CAMPING-CAR PARK the European network of stopover sites and services area, this is his webpage:

name: Praia da Lamiña
description: Good place to stay, there is a large sandy parking lot. There is water at the picnic areas, but it doesn't flow that much.

name: La Casa del Torreón
description:
Long distance travelers on motorcycles, 4x4 or adventure trucks can camp in our property which is a rural house in the countryside where we kindly attend visitors. 

The camping area is wild but has the amenities in the country house such as toilet, shower, washing and drying clothes, wifi connection, etc. The garden is huge with swiming pool, water pond, and pultry.
 
There is no need to book in advance but you can call by mobile or whatsapp beforehand.
Fee per day: 20 € (max days: 2)

+34 691 680 153
Hugo Scagnetti
(globalrider adventurer)

name: Area Autocaravanas Ordoki
description: Free Area to park and sleep with water and near a nice village in Baztan zone. Also space for overland trucks.

name: Peralada
description:
It is a municipal parking, in June/2023, free. Area reserved for motorhomes.

Equipped with drinking water (5 minutes=1€) paid by bank card. You can also empty gray and black water. watched by cameras.

Es un parquing municipal, en Junio/2023, gratuito. Área reservada para autocaravanas.

Equipado con agua potable (5 minutos=1€) pagó con tarjeta bancaria. Tmbien se pueden vaciar aguas grises y negras. Vigilado por cámaras

name: Trapaga Bosch car service
description:
Extremely kind. He did everything he could to help us and succeeded. Gave us water and electricity
---
Extrêmement gentil. Il a tout fait pour nous aider et a réussi. prête eau et électricité

name: Parking next to Mirador Falconera
description: Spot with incredible view. Parking through night is allowed, but not for carawans, the road is very quiet at night. no toilets or shops nearby

name: Camping
description: Small camping middle of nature . Electra en showers are good

name: Andalusische Windräder
description:
Absolute solitude, sunny fields and the best panoramic views in Andalusia. No prohibition sign, paths are the service entrances of the windmills, easy to drive on.
.....
Absolute Einsamkeit, Sonneblummenfelder und den besten Rundumblick in Andalusien. Kein Verbotschild, Wege sind die Servicezufahrten der Windmühlen, gut zu befahren.

name: Área de Servicios para Caravanas
description: Parking lot with 6 spaces for mobile homes at a busy street, but getting quiet at night.

name: Area de Autocaravanas El Mosquin
description:
Coming from the west, it's the only place to overnight legally! 10 euros for a very neat pitch, including a hot shower and toilet! We are very excited!

Aus dem Westen kommend einzige Möglichkeit legal zu stehen! 10 Euro für einen sehr gepflegten Stellplatz, inklusive heißer Dusche und WC! Wir sind sehr begeistert!

name: Balsas de BASACOL
description: At the end o of the road. Only for AWD. There is  phone signal. Picnic tables. It is possible to take a bath.

name: Camping El Helguero
description:
Nice campground with many facilities.
Three swimming pools, bar and restaurant, supermarket, hot showers. Friendly staff. 
€24,50 for two persons, a tent and a motorcycle.

name: Vic
description:
Camperplace for €5,- per night. 
Place for water, electric and many flat places.

name: Frontón
description:
Quiet place to sleep. Open covered space
------------------
Sitio tranquilo dormir .Espacio cubierto abierto

name: Mallos de Riglos
description: Place near main road but very pleasant. Only for AWD vehicles. Phone signal. Very good views of Mallos de Riglos.

name: Park Badia Gran
description: There's a fountain of potable water available 24/7 inside the park for kids. Lots of places to park while getting water

name: Gravel flat spot
description: Nice view. Gravel flat area for tent not too far from the dirt road.

name: Emergency camp
description: If you’re stock you can camp here. It’s no the side of the road though. Big space.

name: Small camp with a view
description: Small camp next to the trail. There is small green grass at the moment after rains

name: Borda Juan Ramón: Camping de montaña
description: Stunning! Simply stunning. We (friend & I on motorbikes) arrived mid June and the site hadn’t opened for the season. As the gate was open and it was late in the day we pitched out tent. Lush grass, beautiful restaurant, toilet block etc (obviously closed). The views over the surrounding mountains are as good as you’ll find anywhere…

name: Fluss in der Wüste
description:
Translation : Tranquil BBQ area created by locals! River for swimming and absolutely still, incl. tables, benches and barbecue facilities. Perfetto also for several days.

Ruhiger von Einheimischen angelegter Grillplatz! Fluss zum Schwimmen und absolut still, inkl. Tische, Bänke und Grillmöglichkeit. Perfetto auch für mehrere Tage.

name: Parking s'Estalella
description: Free parking spot. Enough space for a camper or big car. You can sleep comfortably inside the vehicle.

name: Parking Cala sa Nau
description: Free parking right next to Cala sa Nau. Very busy during the day, it gets empty at around 20 pm on summer. At Cala sa Nau there's a beach bar open from 9am to 22pm

name: Showers Cala sa Nau
description: Free public showers at the beach in Cala sa Nau

name: Nice place at the river
description: Nice place to the river. Possible to swim. 2 Picknick Tables arround. Some ground clearance recommended because of gravel road to the place.

name: Platja Cala Varques
description: Remote beach 40 min walking from closest parking. Busy during the day and at around 20 it starts to empty. Usually people spend the might there. You can sleep on the sand or under the pines

name: Pines Cala Varques
description: 10 min walking from the beach there is a spot next to the water with pines for hammocks. There's also some patches of groups for bivouacking.

name: Parking Embassament del Cúber
description: Parking spot next to a picnic area. Close to the road but far enough not to be awaken by cars passing by. Enough space for multiple cars. Has a public bathroom available and a natural source of water

name: Font d'en Cúber
description: Natural source of water next to the parking

name: Fuente De El Pico
description:
Capricorns and Swiss Alps Feelings, Fountains and Epic Panorama!

Steinböcke und Schweizer Alpenfeelings, Brunnen und Epic Panorama!

name: Clairière in the Forest
description:
Nice flat green spot in the middle of the forest, quiet and nice view. we heard hunters and wild boars. we also had a horse just near us.
the road is pretty rocky and you'll need at least AT tires as we have and good ground clearance.

name: Font de Sant Isidre
description: Nice fountain to fill up water with good flow it passes our filters that need ~2bars

name: Buda de Gudar camping
description: a very quiet small-scale campsite, nice sanitary facilities and a nice couple as owners. They only speak Spanish. Campsites are rare here. glad we found this place. We paid € 25, which is expensive, but these people really deserve it because they do this with heart and soul and there is not much tourism here.

name: Hostel Gutierrez
description:
A small hostel in Ceuta. Bad Parking Situation.  possible to Park 1 to 3 Motorbikes at the way to the hostel.  
Prize for one Person 35 Euro.

name: Burgos, Parking de autocaravanas municipal
description:
Motorhome area next to the Alcampo shopping center, quiet area to sleep or park, and with several parking spaces.
---
Zona de motorhomes junto al centro comercial Alcampo, zona tranquila para dormir o estacionar, y con varias plazas de parking.

name: Nice spot near the riverside
description:
Nice place for one 4*4 or tents just aside the road as you're not allowed to get off the track
the river is just 5 meters from the spot, no cell coverage

name: Lost Hotel
description: Old abfoned Hotel.  Good for one Night with Sight. After the Parkinglot left

name: Meson los Prados
description: Nice little Restaurant. Classic Spanish.

name: La Casona de la Luz
description:
Nice little hostel, with kitchen and living room. a little bit like a living community.  
A big courtyard in the back could be used for motorbikes or cars, but ask before.

name: Playa de Esteiro
description:
Free parking for Cars and Campervans. Allowed to sleep here for 1 night. Right in front of a good surf spot. Signs say 1 night stay is allowed. 
Cold showers, toilets and drinking water available at beach entry. 
Toilets are not always open though.

name: Irutzun Parking autocaravanas
description: Payment area, with shops and restaurant services about 500 meters away in the town of Irurtzun, also cleaning and maintenance of bicycles

name: Fresh water
description:
At this caravan parking place you can find fresh water 
good debit passes well through our filter, I would say more than 3 bars
it was possible to plug our gardena directly to the tap
Also possible to empty GRAY water only

name: Hostel Albergue Lacho
description: Really nice clean hostel with several rooms, big kitchen/dining area, and outdoor seating. Run by a nice guy, Manuel. Prices vary but I paid €16 per night for a comfortable single room to myself.

name: beautiful road
description: Beautiful road heading to Leon from the north. We saw quite a few wild animals

name: Motorcycle Island
description: Little privat House with rooms for Bikers from a German Couple.

name: Finestras 2.0
description:
Nice little spot just aside the road there is also a spit 500meters ahead where two jeeps were already staying.
nice view over the muralla and the abandonned village
ground clearance and 4WD recommended

name: parking gratis para autocaravanas
description:
Ample parking, without services, you can stay overnight

____________________-

estacionamiento amplio, sin servicios, se puede pernoctar

name: Puente Antiguo
description: Magnificently beautiful spot right by the lake, just out of sight of the highway and access road. The proximity to the highway made it a bit loud, but there are spots all along the access road to camp and I’m sure you can find a better spot out of earshot. Fishing enthusiasts and hikers do come to the lake to fish early morning until late night but no problems there.

name: Field spot
description: Nice spot in the middle of nowhere just aside the road

name: estacion de servicio
description:
fuel station that provides free water
nice and nice debit

name: Cascata de la Mola
description: Wild camping between the trees, but not for big vehicles. Safe, quiet and very close to the Cascada de la Mola. Only 25km to Barcelona. Halfway up a hill, with city (and noise) on both sides. Access road is unpaved, the level spot is on a side road off the unpaved road, nicely hidden from view.

name: canta gallos
description: Water fountain good water fresh indeed possible to connect a Gardena or else

name: nice spot near a stone wall
description: spot almost flat with nice trees around on top of a steep little track

name: small parking
description: Small parking, space for 3-4 campers. Next to the bins. This isn't the bigger parking with barriers you can see from the road, it's just up the smaller road behind the recycling bins. I 3 campers there, no signs or anything indicating it's not allowed to park for the night.

name: La Tejera
description: Open hut in good conditions, good campsites and drinking water from spring. Conveniently located next to the Cantábrico-Mediterraneo Vía Verde old railway, but also easily accessible by motorvehicles

name: Massanet de Cabreins
description:
I have spent the night here. It's a little hot, since it's summer, but if you put one on the fig tree there, in the morning you're in full shade, cool and pleasant until at least 11:30 a.m.

He pasado la noche aquí. Hace un poco de calor, dado que es verano, pero si se pone uno en la higuera que hay, por la mañana estás a plena sombra, fresquito y agradable hasta por lo menos las 11:30

name: Quiet place near a river
description: A nice quiet place next to a river and man made waterfall

name: Urdax public toilets
description: Little house with public toilets and water tap for gardena hoseclip

name: Camping Los Robles
description: Great site next to a lake. Has power and good warm showers and toilets. Price paid €6.72/person, €6.73/tent, €4.55/ motorbike including taxes. Power is extra.

name: Leroy Merlin - propane adaptor
description:
Hardware store/ do it yourself. We found the adaptor for small propane bottles 600cc both USA to EU and vise versa. 
So we are able to use the adaptor on our Colman stove with EU propane. The part is in the torch and propane lane.

name: parking madariaga (3m. heights)
description: practical parking spot 15€ for a day. 3 meters heights and near Guggenheim museum

name: free fountain on highway
description:
There is a free fountain with drinkable water at this point in the highway.
It's signaled 400 m before if I remember correctly.
There are parking slots and also a few tables and chairs to eat something.
The place is open air.
I visited this during summer.

26 July 2023

name: Bielsa Rio Cinca
description: Magnificent view at beautiful rough mountains. Located next to a small stream and waterfall. Next to GR 11 where friendly wanderers pass by.

name: Can Josep
description:
Nice Hostal with lovely owners. Just 10 minutes walking from the center. Secure Moto parking in the Garage. 
Basic but authentic rooms. 
Highly recommend Dinner here. 
50€ per Night 1 Person + Moto, including a very delicious breakfast buffet. 

Make sure to call before and don't reserve on booking.com (Would have been 66€ without the breakfast)

name: Camping Olimpia
description: A well located and easily accessible location just off the main highway. Perfect for an overnight stop. Excellent facilities with restaurant and small bar. Good size and level pitches. Friendly welcome.

name: Parking de autocaravanas Jaizubia
description: Service area and parking for motorhomes monitored 24 hours by video surveillance and guard.  It has 44 parking spaces with an approximate surface area of ​​25m2 each.  All seats have an electrical outlet.  It also offers drinking water intake, gray and black water discharge point. 20 Euros/day

name: Ávila
description: Campsite in the forest.  There is a fountain with water

name: La Pradera de Arthur
description:
Free camping in a privileged place

________________________

Acampada libre en un lugar pirivilegiado

name: Hostal Can Josep
description: No one needs me to tell them where to find a place to stay around here, but I add this because the hotel owners - lovely people - keep a garage under the hotel that’s only used for motorcycles. It’s a big spacious storeroom that’ll keep your bike safe and sound until you tear off up the N260 again in the morning. About 50 euro a night for one. A good country breakfast included.

name: Camping Can martí
description: Camping abierto en temporada de verano hasta finales de agosto, muy cercano al pueblo de Tossa, 700m

name: Camping Tossa
description:
campsite located on the outskirts of Tossa, 2.5km towards llagostera, it is a cool area in summer, away from roads and traffic and at the same time close to the town
---
camping situado en las afueras de Tossa, a 2.5km dirección llagostera, es una zona fresca en verano, apartado de carreteras y tráfico y a la vez cerca de el pueblo

name: Fornalutx Tramuntana
description: Public parking & picnic area outside of Fornalutx - good for a night or 2 - locals come here for hiking & bbq - the entry path looks narrow but big rigs can fit - absolutely quiet

name: Mirador mingorramos
description: Nice wild campsite for van or tent. In the andalusia park. Be aware of animals

name: Entrada al embalse y rio
description:
The place is close to the river, a great temperature, a tranquility to spend the night, it is safe when we arrived, there were others.
When we arrived we couldn't enjoy the reservoir, it was very dry but the river was worth it, finding out on the way we went with our truck without any problem in summer
---------------------
El lugar está cerca al río una temperatura genial una tranquilidad para pasar la noche es seguro cuando llegamos habían otros. 
al llegar no pudimos disfrutar del embalse estaba muy seco pero el río valió la pena es enterarse por el camino fuimos con nuestro camión sin problema en verano

name: Plan
description: Incredible spot to camp just in front of the mountain range

name: Tortosa Parc Hotel
description:
Reasonable rates. Clean full service hotel. Friendly staff and private secure parking for cars and bikes. Food close-by and cold beer. Safe quiet neighborhood. Clean rooms with AC TV.
I paid €51 total.

name: *4x4* Puerto de la Ahumada
description:
Spectacular and quiet place, full of animals such as cows, horses or sheep. People also usually pass by in bici but nobody bothers. We have been with our loose dog and there has been no problem. The only bad thing is the access, it is reached by a track that is quite complicated for RV's or cars, for a 4x4 it is relatively simple.

Sitio espectacular y tranquilo, lleno de animales como vacas, caballos u ovejas. También suele pasar gente en vici pero nadie molesta. Hemos estado con nuestro perro suelto y no ha habido problema alguno. Lo único malo es el acceso, se llega por una pista bastante complicado para fuegos o turismos, para un 4x4 es relativamente sencilla.

name: Balsas de BASACOL
description: Only for AWD vehicles. It is the end of the road. Pleasant place with picnic tables. It’s posible to take a bath.

name: Mirador de Buitres
description: AT the end of the gravel road. Incredible view of the landscape. Without any service. Mobile phone signal.

name: St Joan de Avellaneda
description:
Very pleasant place. At the end of off-road track. There isn’t exit. AWD is very recommend. 
This place is located at 1 km of St Joan de Avellaneda little church.

name: Santuario de Falgars
description: Parking. Road. From here start a lot of trekking routes.

name: Tor road
description:
It is a parking near the Tor road. There are some place but we arrive here at night and sleep in this. 
Very quiet. No phone signal. Only for AWD.

name: Estany del port
description: It is a parking where start trekking trails. very pleasant. No phone signal. It is posible to arrive here without AWD vehicle but it is a very uncomfortable road.

name: Pantano Sant Antoni
description: Very quiet place even in summer. You can take a bath in the water. Please do not go to the shore is prohibited and it is dangerous because of the mud. There is a phone signal.

name: Bande Beach
description: Increíble place. Be careful with the entrance from main road, it is aver sharp turn. Very pleasant place where you can take a bath in the river.

name: parking Saint-Palais, Francia  aire de stationnement camping car
description:
this place is security aire de stationnement camping car
It was a good place to sleep we went by truck and a sub with a tent and we were able to spend the night without problems, you can go with dogs there were several caravans very safe the place the City Council makes it easy to spend the night there is a river to for fishing
 recommended
fue un buen lugar para dormir fuimos en camión y un sub con  carpa y pudimos hacer noche sin problemas, se puede ir con perros habían varias caravanas muy seguro el lugar el Ayuntamiento lo facilita para pernoctar hay un rio para pescar muy recomendable.

name: Nuevo Montesol
description: Budget hotel. Clean accommodations, friendly staff, secure parking for bikes. I parked at the entrance. Restaurant, 24hr staff. Good for a night's stop.

name: Taller Honda Lopega Malaga
description: Excellent service team. Honda service and parts. I changed front tire - walk-in service. Great rates, perfect service. Highly recommend this shop if you require any motorcycle service.

name: Embassy OF Cameroon  Madrid
description:
Translation: This is the Cameroonian Embassy in Madrid. Any Overlander who intends to transit or visit Cameroon, this is the right place to get your Cameroon visa sticker in your passport after processing it online.
  You will be informed that the land borders from Nigeria to Cameroon are restricted to tourists. Tell them that you will send and cross your vehicle or motorcycle from the port of Calabar in southwestern Nigeria to the port of Limbe, Tiko or Douala and then proceed. For more information about the boat, please visit: www.boatfromnigeriatocameroon.com for more information and contact the boat company via WhatsApp.

Esta es la Embajada de Camerún en Madrid.  Cualquier Overlander que tenga la intención de transitar o visitar Camerún, este es el lugar adecuado para obtener la etiqueta adhesiva de su visa de Camerún en su pasaporte después de procesarla en línea.
 Se le informará que las fronteras terrestres de Nigeria a Camerún están restringidas para turistas.  Dígales que enviará y cruzará su vehículo o motocicleta desde el puerto de Calabar en el suroeste de Nigeria hasta el puerto de Limbe, Tiko o Douala y luego procederá.  Para obtener más información sobre el barco, visite: www.boatfromnigeriatocameroon.com para obtener más información y comunicarse con la empresa del barco a través de WhatsApp.

name: Wild camping spot
description: Wild camping spot not too far from the small village that is close by. I’ve been the whole afternoon here and no one walked on the path that is right next to. Is possible that if someone walks there, sees you. It is accesible easily by maxitrails and 4x4 maybe can fit.

name: Rest Area
description: Area with tables, running water in the forest, nice spot to sleep in a van or camping car

name: Hidden hill top
description:
There is a little double track leading up to this hill. Looks like you’re going into a dense forest area but when you get to the top you go down a few metres and it opens up in a big area clear of trees. Given the signs I think a few people with van or vehicles use it. 

No cell coverage

name: camping with water
description: Beautifull place to stay for a moment or to be in the day. I came here to have water and eat something. Good place to sleep with your van.

name: O Foxo Longo
description: A very nice place on a small cliff. very quiet just a few fishermen and the Sea.

name: area with water and toilets
description: i've been here for one night with my tend. A very quiet place to stay, near to a caravan parking. It is also a beautiful place to pass the day

name: Quiet place next to a river
description: This is a nice spot next to a river, where you can stay with a tent or a campervan/motorhome. It is close to the highway and also accessible with a normal vehicle (no 4x4 needed).

name: Embalse de ricobayo
description: Wild camping spot. Quiet night. The path is not suitable for big vehicles

name: hided place for tent close to the main road
description:
Bike/Motorbike only!!!   There is this cool place. If I come here by night nobody will see you. It's close to the road the takes to the highway, after a roundabout.
It's safe, and you can barely see the tent in the day.
I've done this in August 2023 with a motorcycle and a tent.
Great also, I think, for just people or bikes.

name: Molino Mareal El Pintao
description: This is a museum of an old water mill, the attraction is closed Sunday to Wednesday so the car park is free, no restrictions obvious, nice water around but no sea view, safe and quiet place for the evening

name: Parque de la Dehesa Boyal
description:
Dehesa Boyal Park close to Buenaventura. Quiet, clean and water source. Camping and swing area. There is a graveyard with cold water
at the end of the paved road. 


Good landscape.

name: Playa de Xagó
description: Very large open parking near the beach, great surfspot and easily accessible. Toilets during the day (they close at night) and outdoor showers. Police comes by from time to time but as long as you’re not making fires, there is no issue. Lot’s of vans here but not recommended with a tent.

name: rio noguera ribagorzana
description:
The river that borders La Portella and Albesa has several areas where you can stop. You can pitch a tent in some places, and also park caravans. very good river water

___________________________

el rio que linda con la portella y albesa, tiene varias zonas donde parar. puede armarsse una tienda en algunos lugares, y tambien aparcar caravanas. agua del rio muy buena

name: Batería castillitos y Cabo tiñoso
description:
Parking near an old military fort, there is another parking lot on the other side of the road. Very quiet at night. Be careful of the access road, narrow, lots of blind turns and potholes.

_________________________________

Parking  proche d'un ancien fort militaire, il y a un autre parking de l'autre côté de la route. Très calme la nuit. Attention à la route d'accès, étroit, beaucoup de virages à l'aveugle et nids de poules.

name: Estany d'Ivars i Vila sana
description:
Translation: A very quiet place, with large level spaces to set up a tent. There is a lagoon, but the water is not drinkable

un lugar muy tranquilo, con grandes espacio nivelados donde armar una tienda. hay una laguna, pero el agua no es potable

name: cemintiri de Pomár
description:
Translation: Place to park or set up a tent or tent. The cemetery is always open and has drinking water. please respect the place and rest of the deceased

lugar para estacionar o armar una carpa o tienda. el cementerio esta siempre abierto y tiene agua potable. por favor, respetar el lugar y el descanso de los difuntos

name: Camp Ground Sanlucar (vehicles only)
description:
Cheap and simple camp gound for RVs and camping cars. NO Tents allowed, only vehicles. 
Price is € 10,- for one car and 2 people without electricity. (Extra € 4,- per day)
Very friendly owner.
No (or very little) shade. 
Has some toilets and some showers (which require € 1,- per 5 minutes hot water) 
Drinking water and waste water dumping at the place. 
Some places with no electricity. 
Small supermarket within walking distance (600m), big ones (Lidl, Mercadona...) approx 4 km away. Walking distance to the beach.
All in all no problem if you have a well equipped rig and if you are not too much into luxury.

name: Camping Alquézar
description: Camping ground with swimming pool, restaurant, supermarket, microwave and freezer. Well maintained and friendly!

name: Organyo park camping and pool
description: Good little campsite with great pool. A little noise from road below on certain pitches if pitching a tent. Facilities good. Good restaurant

name: camping libre- free( for tents and campers)
description:
Free camping for tents, or tents, and caravans. large space, with bathrooms, a park and some tables. all free!

___________________________

campamento libre para tiendas, o carpas, y caravanas. amplio espacio, con baños, parque y unas mesas. todo gratis!

name: parking de Castellfollit de la roca
description:
Translation: Large parking next to a square, with a place to stop with campers, caravans, and put up tents. It does not directly express that camping is allowed, but everything is done to be able to do it. It is close to the town, there is a market and pharmacy nearby. It also has a public bathroom, with water and electricity. very good place to spend a night. NO FIRE, NO GARBAGE, YES RESPECT THE PLACE AND THE NEIGHBORS

amplio parking junto a una plaza, con lugar donde parar con campers, caravanas, y poner tiendas. no expresa directamente que esta permitida la acampada, pero esta todo hecho para poder hacerlo. esta pegado al pueblo, cerca hay mercado y farmacia. tambien tiene baño publico, con agua y electricidad. muy buen lugar para pasar una noche. NO FUEGO, NO BASURA, SI RESPETAR EL LUGAR Y LOS VECINOS

name: Descampado del Pantano
description:
Large parking area near road.

It's allowed to stay here.

900 meters from the abandoned Village.

no shadow.

some noise from the road.
but good for a overnight.

name: Cola del Embalse de Bornos
description:
Very quiet and nice place in the nature. When we came in September, there was no water visible on the water reservoir as it was a very dry summer.

No one showed up, we heard cows but didn’t see them nor horses, but we saw their excrement.

Some moth and insects at night but bearable.

name: Bajada a la playa con bancos y ducha
description:
Next to the route, there is a shower and a path that descends to the beach. On the road, on the right-hand side, you come to an abandoned picnic table and picnic table under a tree. We slept there very peacefully in a tent.

Al lado de la ruta, hay una ducha y un camino que desciende a la playa. En el camino, a mano derecha se llega a un baco y mesa de picnic abandonados bajo un arbol. Dormimos alli muy tranquilos en tienda de campaña

name: refugi sant jordi
description:
Mountain refuge, at the base of the Coll de Jou, between Ogassa and Bruguera. It has plenty of covered space for tents, and a place to light a fire. right on the side of the road
---
refugio de montaña, en la base del coll de jou, entre ogassa y bruguera. tiene bastante lugar techado para tiendas, y un lugar donde prender fuego. justo al costado del camino

name: al lado del rio
description:
a descent puts fishing sense mort. Good place to spend a night, spacious and with lots of grass and flat sections. DO NOT LEAVE GARBAGE, DO NOT LIGHT FIRE!
--
una bajada pone pesca sense mort. buen lugar para pasar una noche, amplio y con mucho pasto y secciones planas. NO DEJAR BASURA, NO ENCENDER FUEGO!

name: At a reservoir near a big dam near Cordoba.
description: Perfect place to stay anywhere around the big lake. A lot of spots high and low to set camp. No wind, very silent until the local Nautic club decided to have a big disco party. In the morning some friendly fisherman came around.

name: refugio de montaña
description:
Translation: Saint Jordi mountain refuge, near the Coll de Jou port. very good for shelter, it has some place to put a tent and another to light a fire

refugio de montaña saint jordi, cerca del puerto del coll de jou. muy bien para refugiarse, tiene algo de lugar donde poner una tienda y otro donde prender fuego

name: sant creu de llagunes, antiguo poblado medieval
description:
Translation: Next to the ruins of an ancient medieval town there is a parking lot and a path, where caravans and tents can be safely accommodated.

junto a las ruinas de un antiguo poblado del medioevo hay un parking y un camino, donde se pueden acomodar tranquilamente caravanas y tiendas

name: Place in the woods, near casa floralis. Best coordinates are 37.256625, -3.477292
description: Place in the woods, near casa floralis. Easy to park. Good place to start a hike. Don't leave your trash. Friendly people in the morning.

name: a la vera del rio
description:
At the detour of the road that goes towards Aidi, you cross a bridge and there is plenty of room next to the river to stop or set up a shop. Do not leave trash or paper
----------------
en el desvio de la carretera que va hacia aidi, se cruza un puente y hay bastante lugar al lado del rio donde parar o poner una tienda. NO DEJAR BASURA NI PAPEL

name: Las Dunas camping
description:
Well kept campground,extra area for tents under the trees  .Beach across the road, friendly to motorcycle, some extra tables would be useful,.
We paid 15 eur 2 per. 1 tent motorcycle.

name: Barranco de Forcallo
description: Really awesome spot. In the middle of nature you find yourself in harmony with the rocks. Nice flat place with grass.

name: os de Cives
description:
flat greppel spot next to the road.

it lays a little lower then the road.

it whas the first spot i saw when i got off the smugglers trail.

afhter 8 hours off road i whas tired and this is a good spot to spent the night.

the Village of os de Cives is 1 km further.
you got a nice vieuw on it.

there you find a restaurant.

many cows are walking free here.

watch out with gsm/cellphone.

it is Spain but, my Phone conected with the Andorra server, so i put it out to avoid high roaming cost.

in the morning great sunset.
it rises exacly on the peak of the mountain.

there is natural water from a little creek.

name: Parking and services for free
description: Great spot to spent the night/day before going on the El Negre off road track. Only 3.8 km from the start. Official free camper spot. Drinking water. Grey water point. Nice view over the Pyreneeën. Shadow in the little park in front of the parking. Come early, slowly it's getting full and I am off season. 2 dedicated places for campers. But also room on the normal parkings. Friendly locals.

name: desvio de la carretera
description:
Translation:A small detour leads to a fairly flat place, hidden from the main road. perfect for setting up a store.

un pequeño desvio da a un lugar bastante plano, y oculto de la carretera principal. perfecto para poner una tienda.

name: ermita de san miguel
description:
Next to the hermitage of San Miguel, near Broto, there is some space where you can set up a small tent. Excellent for cyclists or travelers on foot.

junto a la ermita de san miguel, cerca de Broto,hay algo de lugar donde armar alguna tienda pekeña. excelente para ciclistas o viajantes a pie.

name: sabiñánigo alto
description:
Very close to the town, a dirt and stone detour leads to the edge of the stream, and there are tables and a drinking water fountain. good place to put a tent for the night, or stop with a small caravan. No fire, no garbage, no disturbing noises. Please respect the place.
-----------
muy cerca del pueblo, un desvio de tierra y piedra lleva al margen del riachuelo, y en el lugar hay mesas y una fuente de agua potable. buen lugar para poner una tienda por la noche, o parar con una caravana pequeña. NO FUEGO, NO BASURA, NO RUIDOS MOLESTOS.por favor respeta el lugar.

name: Camping
description: Nice flat Campspot, next to the Camino with a watersource. Toilette and WiFi are available at the next Café/Hostal maybe 20 meters further. There is also a little shelter next to it, but it's Not big enough for sleeping inside.

name: Brigida
description: watersource. you just have to push pretty hard for water to come out. it is also a nice flat spot, where you could easily put up a tent, not rechable for cars. And pretty close to the Camino trail.

name: refugio libre de Aisa
description:
open shelter, on the pass from Borau to Aisa. Dirty, but with some shelter and a place to put a tent or leave a caravan. good views of the valley and nearby mountains

refugio abierto, en el paso desde Borau a Aisa. sucio, pero con algo de refugio y lugar donde poner tienda o dejar una carabana. buenas vistas del valle y las montañas cercanas

name: refugio de Hecho/Aisa
description: mountain cabin, when i stay it was open. very nice and clean, whit fireplace. big space for vans and big rigs. at 1000msnm aprox

name: Camino a Bacor
description: A very silent place, a wonderful view from the bizarre hills, a flat land spot. It's on the track PR-A 426 to go a circle around from Gorafe and back. It's a bad road but a place to feel happy. I passed day and night.

name: Area autocaravanas de Pamplona
description: Parking for campers with electricity and water. Costs €10 per 24 hours without electricity.

name: Area del autocaravanes
description: Car park close to bus station with specific camper facilities such as water, brown water drain and chemical toilet dump. Camper spaces are free and marked out. Toilets in bus station. Very close to town.

name: Casalarreina autocaravanas parking
description: Camper parking opposite sports ground. Water and wc dump provided. Quiet at night. Close to town

name: Párking Guethary
description:
Translation: ¨It is a good, safe, quiet place. We arrived after September 15 and there were no restrictions for Campers. We went with a small truck and spent two nights, highly recommended.
It has a bike path and the beach is 10 minutes away on foot.
Nearby there are many places to eat and drink

Es unnbuen lugar seguro tranquilo llegamos después del 15 de septiembre y no había restricciones para Camper nosotros vamos con un camioncito y pasamos dos noches muy recomendable.
tiene un paseo para ir en bicicleta y caminando la playa esta a 10 minutos. 
cerca hay muchos lugares donde comer y tomar algo

name: between wine fields
description:
quit and peacefull place.
large open grass field.
vieuw on the Church of Lleida.

next to nature reservar.

friendly locals Who work in the winter fields.

overnight is allowed.

tranquilo

name: bardenas reales
description:
good spot when you want to viset Bardenas Reales.
large open space with a vieuw on the cave houses.
in the evening muskito's bring anti muskito stuf.
populair place, you wont be alone.

name: Casitas de la Sierra
description:
A lawn in front of a small, very clean holiday apartment. With a magnificent view of the karst mountains. The swimming pool can be shared.
Bird watching and hiking.
10 € per Night + 5 € Swimmingpool

name: new camper spot
description:
exelent, clean and brand New camper spot.

30 places on concreet.
buitifull sunset.

free shower 
free drinking water.
toilets.

there is camera surveillance.
nice picknick tables with good vieuw.

elektriciteit availble.
for that you need coins, you buy in the small Village.

if you spent more than 10 euro in the Village restaurant, you get them for free.

thank you litlle Village for this excellent place.

name: PARKING BODEGAS NELEMAN
description: Parking next to winery that makes organic wines. Place with beautiful surroundings nestled in the Hoces del Cabriel Natural Park. Capacity for 6 caravans, with electricity, drinking water and first class sanitary facilities (toilet and shower).

name: fountain at a picnic place
description: a fountain whit potable water, by the river

name: under the bridge(like the RHCP :)
description: there's a place to pintch a small tent next to the via verde of the Bidasoa, and eurovelo 1 route, right under the bridge. i guess its only accesible by bike or walking. it was a way to the river, awsome place to take a shower, spend the afternoon and the night

name: parking near hike trail
description:
large parking
owner is a restaurant.

allowed to overnight.

in the evening Police drove by, friendly greetings and no problems.

the place is amazing to watch the vultures.

they are on the rocks and fly above you.

also the start of a hike.
the first part only 600 meters following a path trough the canyon.

recommanded.


follow the path and you will get to the Village and monestary.

8.4 km in total.

there is a restaurant, in september open at friday saturday, and sunday.

also a coke and water machine.

in daytime, people come to hike and watch the vultures.

at night realy quit.

spent 2 nights here.

name: Fuente
description: Public water fountain on the street corner, just outside Pica & Pica. Potable water according to tourist office. Good fast flow and good taste

name: Area de Autocaravanas de Cordoba
description: A large campground. $23 a night. U can pay for potable water. Dump (G/B) is free. You can go walking by 15min to the historic city and the wall. No bathrooms.

name: Free Parking: About 1km to historic bridge
description: Free parking for all. Maximum size for car spots is 6 meters. No bathroom, no water, no dump. Just a free place to park and/or overnight. Quiet and safe.

name: water fountain, public wc
description:
next to the Juan Sebastian El kano statue, down the street, there is a public bathroom (no showers) with electricity. 

you can obtain water from the tap in the plaza

name: camper parking
description:
small Village 
official free camper place
14 parkings
free water
grey water dump.

by walking distance 1 bar / 1 restaurant but only open in weekend.

Just a nice free place on the way to Portugal.

there is a gate, you have to open it manualy.

picknick benches.

name: Hollywood scene spot
description: Nice spot next to an abandoned village used for Hollywood films. In the evening you will have some mountainbikers coming by but afterwards you’re alone. No facilities and you can enter the Hollywood buildings at own risk. Recommended for vans and 4x4.

name: a path down to the rocks
description:
a path to the rocks down in the coast line, its fine to put a small tent . nice place to cicloturist, its near the road but very stealth. NO FIRE, NO LEAVE TRASH OR PAPERS.
------------
un camino que da a las piedras donde rompe la costa, se presta para poner una tienda pequeña. buen lugar para cicloturistas, cerca de la carretera pero bien oculto. NO ENCENDER FUEGO, NO DEJAR BASURA NI PAPELES.

name: Auto-Service Laundry 8-23h, every day.
description: Auto-self laundry. Open 8-23h every day. 4 washers (10/15/20kg) and 3 dryers (20kg).

name: Ledigos parc
description: flat space of grass, with water source and a playground on the Camino. Benches and tables and a restaurant on the other side of the street.

name: Rough track to GR
description: There are a few turnouts on the pretty rough track off the paved road (A-226) leading up the mountain and connecting to the GR (long distance hiking trail). We chose a level(ed), earsplittingly quiet spot with pine trees close to the junction with the GR. (Do not camp in between olive trees or on cultivated land, which is probably private.) The track is uneven, has water ruts and is stoney right from the beginning: not sure if you could do this without 4WD.

name: Instituto Aragonés del AGUA
description: Free drinking water from the water institute. Push action tap, no thread on tap, but standard EU hose will fit over tap. No camping allowed (posted).

name: Santa Pola boulevard
description: Parking in the street directly near the beach. Lots of restaurants and shops. Stayed here with several campers also in the streets beside the boulevard, no problems at all

name: Camino de Santiago en Playa Berria (only pedestrian access)
description: Next to the beach, there is a path that guides you to a secluded beach. It's a Camino de Santiago path, and has some places to pitch a small tent. Only good for bike travelers . You can charge devices in the toilets in the beach, and have showers near the beach too

name: Delta, Puig de Ros
description: Parking close to the sea. If you have a 4x4 you could reach really nices spots

name: refuxio
description:
nice flat space for multiple tents and two roofs in Case it rains. There are fireplaces and a possibility to fill up water(Just reachable by foot or bike). There are also two small parking spaces for a Car,etc. However it could be a little tricky to reach.
Google says it is open on Friday and Saturday so it could be a bit more busy those days. I camped there in a Tuesday and no one bothered me, but a few joggers and people Walking their dogs came by.

name: rest area
description: rest area with tables, benches and a little Kiosk (don't know If it is open). Showers were closed when I visited. A few people with dogs, some who were sunbathing, otherwise quiet. Big Parking space right next to it.

name: Fuente
description: Water fountain on the little plaza. quite slow flow but supposedly potable

name: playa de usgo
description:
very good beach, very chill, whit nice flat place to put a tent, and a parking for vans. don't have any sign of prohibited camp. only have shower, but no WC or electricity. An Erosky supermarket its a 1.5km
----
buenisima playa, muy tranquila, con gran espacio nivelado para poner tienda, y un parking para caravanas. No pone en ningun lugar que este prohibido pernoctar ni poner tiendas. facil acceso, con ducha , pero sin WC ni electricidad. hay un supermercado Erosky a 1km y medio.

name: Nacimiento Rio Jucar
description: Really nice spot in the middle of the forest where the Jucar river starts… 4x4 needed

name: Camping Liébana
description: A new, great camping place in this wonderful region. 50 flat places with water / electricity, place for tents, a swimming pool, washing machine and new, clean facilities beside a restaurant.. For what else are we looking for?

name: Playa San Martin
description: Plenty of space to put a tent. maybe a camper fit too, but the road its narrow. amazing views of the cliffs, and see some surfers catching waves

name: on bike path.picnic area
description: picnic area on bike path w shade tables and working water fountain! you can hear cars but they can't see you. I travel w a bicycle, I'd stay here 100%

name: CUFI Parking
description: Good & save vehicle storage in 10 min walking distance to Girona Airport. Suitable for big rigs.

name: parking near Capo finisterre
description: hard to reach, but worth it. Not as windy as the upper levels. Take the road right before the offical parking for the Capo.

name: Local artificial + agriculture products
description: Wonderful shop to buy local home made cheese and marmalade + wine. Its worth stopping here

name: Santa Coloma Área for Motorhomes
description: RV area provided by the town.  Free to park next to a tennis court.  Power is offered at €2 per day.  Non potable water available as are grey and black dumping.  Good Vodafone reception.  Close to the town for shops etc.

name: Taller Joan Bonet
description: We had an electrical issue and stopped in here.  Someone saw us right away and fixed it right up pretty quickly for a reasonable cash price.  It's a Ford dealership too.  Recommend!

name: Play Mundaka
description: Cold shower by the water. Free………some people here swimming during the day.

name: Cemetery
description: Nice water tap by the cemetery. Have to push and hold to turn on. Good pressure. No fittings.

name: Just outside PN de Cornalvo
description:
A level spot under cork oak trees just outside Parque Natural de Cornalvo, next to the track through the park. To get here, use the South entrance of the park and follow the 9,5 km track through the park until you exit the park (see back of entrance sign on left side of cattle grid) at the northern side. The site is at the right, across the ditch.

The track continues after the park but it's too narrow and overgrown for our Land Cruiser.

There are "private hunting" signs throughout ("coto privado de caza" with license number) which does not mean the land is private, just the hunting.

The ditch may (seasonally) have water in it; there are traces of cattle and menure.

name: Parking near stadium
description: This is a huge dirt parking lot south of the futbol stadium outside the low emissions zone.  No services but free.  We spent two nights here.  Other than highway noise pretty good. We left the vehicle during the day and took the train into the city with no issues. Train station Cornella to Metro. The parking lot fills up in the evening but all gone by 10ish.  Very good cell reception.

name: Platja Pobla de la Farnals Aire
description: Municipality provides 20 free spaces for RVs with some services.  There's black and grey dumping, rubbish bins and potable water filling.  Great cell reception.  Supermarket nearby and 1 km to the beach.  There's a bus stop to take you into the city.  Bus 112A runs hourly - see pink ping in photo attached.  Green ping is the aire.  If there's no room you can use services and park nearby.

name: Near Hontalar Refuge
description: Nice spot at the side of the path. close to Hontalar Refuge.

name: CAMPERSUR
description: Travelers passing through Seville, we called on this company for the purchase, the installation of an additional battery with a wooden box, as well as the transformation of a panel for the shower, Warm welcome, available, most professional work  and competitive prices. I recommend. The most possibility of sleeping safely in front of the shop to start

name: Fuente
description: water fountain. i called the town hall and apparently it's not potable, so use for washing only or filter before drinking

name: Lakeside
description: beautifull campsite on the border of the lake. Pretty remote. Offroad motorcycle or 4*4 required

name: Lavapobla
description: small laundry with washers and dryers.  Open every day 9 to 10.  5, 6 ,7, € washer, 3 and 5 ,€ dryers.  We didn't use  but wanted to add here.  Seems very clean.

name: Gran Camping Zarautz
description:
Nice campsite on a hill with nice views, not far of a beach (long stairs to go down the hill).
25.20€ in October for 2 persons and a car with no electricity. It was really quiet.
Hot showers, laundraumat, restaurant, ...

name: Camping Ruta de la plata
description: Official campsite. Swimming pool. Excellent showers. Motor homes etc electricity or not. But run down. We paid €19/n for van.

name: Malaga Top Hostel
description: Really nice hostel .. with plenty safe parking for the motorbike outside just front of the hostel no problem . And 15 min walk to city center , and chill, new hostel . Good beds , 23€ .

name: Broz hostel
description:
Really nice new hostel , not far from city center , and you can park the motorbike just front of the hostel .. safe neighbor . I would recommended 
14 euros room 6 ppl

name: bastardo hostel
description:
Nice hostel , safe parking outside for the motorbike .. I reccomended . Only motorbikes . 
27 euros 1 night

name: Toño’s
description: Really nice restaurant and good food and really good menu with everything for 15 euros !reccomended

name: Zona d'acampada sa Font Coberta
description:
Really nice camping , hot shower , 5€ per night . Stop before in information center for pay . 
I stayed 3
Night and was good . 
Motorhomes can also stay , but at the oficial parking , it’s cost 8 euros 24 hrs I think

name: poio
description:
24 hours free camper parking.

next to the water.
clean.

water taps in front of the parking near the sea.

restaurant / bar  50 meters.

dogs not allowed to run free, or poop in the park.

nice spot, be awere of the 24 hour rule Police is controling it.

name: punta de torrassa
description: before yo the oil station. Small Road mear the River. excellent place yo put tué tente for One night. big space but it's Better arrive when thé Sun is Down. excellent for cyclistes

name: coast parking
description:
great flat spot / parking at the coast.

buitifull sunset, amazing when the weather is bad.

to get there watch out !! 
the road trough the town is verry narrow!!!

dont trust google maps.

(i did it but got a van)

follow the road around the centrum !

walking path availble nextto the sea.

place got lights at night.

in town at walking distance bar and restaurant.

on the left side, there are fitness machines to work out.

name: El Templo del Sol camping nudista
description: Fully naturist paid campsite with swimming pools, access to the sea, restaurant, supermarket. Very clean but closed in winter, inquire on website

name: ermita de san marcos
description: its and old ermita, whit a little roof and some tables. have a water tap too, dont know if it safe to drink.

name: lighthouse
description:
camping at the most Northern Point of Spain.

parking 100 meters from the lighthouse.

direct on the clif with stunning vieuw and sunset.

hike trail from here to the most possible Northern point by foot. 
(+/_ 1 km. single way)

600 meters from here a abandonend militair base, worth a viset.

can be spooky, when the weather is 'bad' hard wind !

name: Abandoned village
description: Nice place in an abandoned village. Great view. 4x4 required.

name: Merendero del Plátano de Elche
description:
This is an almost unused picnic place with some wooden and concrete benches
right across from a big parking.You could also go there but I found this was quieter.
Hikes up to the reservoir, nice views.
Water down below-Probably best to filter or come with your own water.
Big parking place above the picnic spot.

name: Fuengirola
description:
Area for approx. 40 motorhomes, free of charge, no water, no electricity, no dumping. WC available.
Gravel, almost even surface.

name: meadow
description:
large meadow direct on the sea next to road.

surfers place, 

50 meters restaurant with food, drinks.

perfect sun rising.

name: light house clif
description:
3 parkings in a row on the road to the lighthouse.

amazing vieuw 360 !!

name: Hills above Cordoba
description: Great site about 20 min from downtown Cordoba. Rough roads getting in but no problem with good clearance 4x4. Very quiet and peaceful. Nice flat site with a great view down the valley.

name: camper place
description:
free camper place Just outside the Village.

grass meadow,
trash can.

48 hours free stay.

restaurant at 5 min. walk.

center of town 800 meters.

name: parking the Ajo
description:
Great spot nearby the cave and direct at the sea.
Very windy !!

Locals and hikers in daytime.
Quiet at night.

when there is storm, park youre car against the wall.

i whas here when the storm ciaran hit.

parked the car against the wall and i whas good.

name: bridge
description: flat space next to a River. water was pretty dirty, when I was there. only reachable by bike or foot

name: Hinter der Ruine
description:
Behind the walls of a crumbling farmhouse is a hidden and level place. Beautiful sunset
==========================

Hinter den Mauern von einem zerfallenen Farmhaus ein versteckter und ebener Platz. Wunderschöner Sonnenuntergang

name: Free camping zone
description: space for many tents, tables, drinking water, small river nearby. I were here in Novembre with only 2 other people. Path here not on google Maps,you have to go to the right when google maps stops the navigation.There is a field track which brings you to the spot. official free camping zone.

name: refugio
description: refugio was open when I was there in November. There's a toilet, a water source, benches and tables, fireplaces and a church. The church was locked

name: old railway Station
description: Old railway station with a little playground, benches and tables, two fire places, a water source (not for drinking) and some shelter from the weather next to the via verde. Wasn't busy in November, that could be different in summer. Also parking space for vehicles, I don't know if it is accessible for bigger rigs.

name: Just for tents
description: small, flat space on the via verde, not for cars. No water, but benches and tables. Close to the active railroad trail.

name: Area de Autocaravanas Castillega de Guzman
description: Row of marked spaces for Motorhomes. Overlooking Seville. Overnight stays permitted.

name: Area Roses Autocaravans
description: Big rig friendly, 70 pitches, all of a good size.  Popular.  Not far from Roses beach, plenty of places to eat, some remain open during low season.

name: Pulpi
description:
A lot of space and flat even for big rigs. Silent spot with some long term trucks parked.

Great seaview but no beach. There is a restaurant in walking distance up the hill and a little store in town.

There are a few spots like this along this coast area.

name: Lago Park
description:
very nice quite campsite with large dam nearby, has cabins and tent pitches
restaurant onsite with little shop and there is town few km away

name: Port Lligat
description:
Large site, expensive in High Season, free in Low Season.  Designated P4, signposted from Cadaques.  Very close to Salvador Dali’s house.
Restaurant/Cafe only open during High Season.

name: 10 parking spots next to town/surf
description:
official camper spots right next to the surf and beach.
unpaid, no facilities other then trash bins. 
We're a 6,5m truck and could just fit

name: San Pelegrin
description: Nice place, AWD necessary to access, thorny grass. Nice view of Aragon and beautiful sunset.

name: Camping
description: campground with restaurant, clean showers but a little old, was still open in November

name: Radiquero
description: Next to the playground, water tap without junction need to pump it or in botles, no access for big vehicles

name: pura vida
description: Very nice place by farmhouse. Beautiful view.

name: Flat place with views
description: Flat place, access for gravel road. Other possibilities near. Maybe not good in summer, no shadows.

name: rest area
description: rest area next to a train Station. Only for tents. Right next to the Eurovelo8, many moscitos.

name: Villa carmen
description: nice peaceful campground with a kitchen. Open all year

name: camping
description: campside looks a bit old from the outside, you have to ring on the gate. the showers are clean and modern, they even have a pool, that was open in November. peaceful and quiet

name: hôtel collina
description: Hôtel simple but clean 80 for 3 pers restaurant and bar

name: sheppards rest
description: little campground, very nice owners, belongs to a dog shelter, was here with the bike and felt very welcomed.

name: Na'Bolera
description: Beautiful rural house in Piloñeta, 2km from Nava. The entire house is rented per night. It has all the services and amenities, it is located in a privileged area with unbeatable views. with garden and barbecue. with the possibility of walks, bike rides, visits to the cider museum, and the river very close.

name: playa cuevas del mar
description: Beautiful beach with caves, climbing routes, and a beach bar that operates seasonally. There is grass, space for motorhomes, and bikepacking. There is also an abandoned factory with a roof and walls in case it rains. There are showers and water, 2km from Nueva where there is a supermarket.

name: Near Cabezuela
description: Hidden from view in a little grove if pine trees, level, surrounded by vineyards and fruit trees, great for bikeriding. Keep it clean.

name: Municipal Camper Park
description: Beautiful FREE camping Park. In front of town wall. Old town at walking distance. Restaurants nearby

name: AC Viveiro
description:
Emptying gray water
Water
2 electricity points
Vaciado de aguas grises
Agua
2 puntos de electricidad

name: water tap
description: agua es vida! water is life! free!

name: Off the Via Verde (bicycles only)
description: perfect for bike travelers. there is a parking behind the via verde building, it have toilets, but when I stay, there are closed. no facilities, but there is flat floor and some shelter. perfect to stay and catch the via verde early in the morning

name: wonderful
description: A parking spot for hikers, not level but doable. Great hiking trails, stunning views. The shepherd came by in the morning with two dogs to check on his sheep. Beautiful!

name: Aldoverde
description:
Please contact us before arrival, even at short notice, so that we can unlock the gate and provide water and electricity if necessary.

 View over and onto the Els Ports Natural Park as well as a direct view of the Barranc de la Conca de Santa Julia with the wonderful sound of birds.

 Completely concrete access road and easy access even in heavy rain.

 - El Toll Blue (15 min)
 - hot springs (30 min)
 - Sea (30 min)
- Bot (wine, 25 min).
 Fully fenced, water and electricity available.
 We speak English, German, Spanish, Russian and Ukrainian. +34623352132

name: Prat de Comte
description: Nice spot. Short distance to the wonderfull mountain village. Empty in the wintertime. 2 Euro fee/night. Very quiet. Dumpstation with water, not shure its potable.

name: Cementerio de Valencia de las Torres
description: A cemetery parking lot far outside the village in the middle of fields, very quiet. Good for an overnight stay. Concrete surface, almost flat. Lonely in the evening and at night. No disturbing street lighting

name: Erabilera-Arauak
description: Along an N-Road. Busy during the day. 2 Nights stay possible. Opposite of a snackbar and a restaurant. No services. Close to the river with tides coming in and out. City 1 km. walk along the river. Nice restaurants. Internet shop.

name: View Spot
description:
Beside a dirt road to Arroyo de la Cala.
perfect for one camper. Great view and quiet. The road is rough in places and high clearance is a good idea.

name: Disused quarry camp
description:
A disused quarry lots of places for camping. 
Looks like it’s used as an off road play area too. 
Camped in December, no body bothered me. 
Beautiful views at the top

name: Deba City Campingcars
description: Huge spot next to the city. Old but suitable for the night. City walking distance. Next to that public transport at your doorstep. Noisy during daytime.

name: Landa
description: Huge Parking. Don't know how busy in summer. But in winter very quiet. We stayed here 3 nights already waiting for spare parts. People come by for a talk. Everybody's very friendly. Restaurant at the corner. Good food good coffee.

name: Area recreativa
description: area recreativa with benches and tables, footballpitch and a little playground. space for tents and parking area. Next to a small river with brown water

name: Pines and fields
description: This spot is quiet, grassy, alongside a wheat field. Dirt road access, great walks near river and in the pine forest. Far away from busy roads.

name: Observation point near reservoir
description: Flat spot near a quiet road. Awesome view.

name: On Top of the hill
description: Quiet place, on Top of the Hill with a great view. I Stayed there one night,  nobody came here. It's a hiking area. Road up there is a bumpy gravel road. I made it up there with my sprintet with 2-Wheel drive.

name: Oropesa
description: Nice and quiet spot, close to the ocean. No sand beach or access to the water (no swimming). Locals come here to fish.

name: Hill top car park
description:
Hill top car park 
Camped in Dec 
Was foggy in the morning but would have great views
Go past the church and up in the right is the car park
Nice and flat 
Nobody around 
Tracks one side suitable only for 4x4
On the church side all can drive

name: Road at beach
description: Nice overnight stay directly at the beach. Some other campers as neighbours.

name: Beach cliff side
description:
Little flat spot for camping
4x4 drive in 
Steep slope with wash outs
Beautiful beach for a walk in the morning 
A couple of walkers in the morning

name: LowCost self laundry
description:
LowCost self laundry.

12 kg 4€/16kg 6€ washing machine (takes 30-40 mins)
3€ dryer 20 mins


1 washing machine (€4) and 1 dryer (€2) for pet stuff 

Working hours 8.00-22.00

name: Recinto Ferial Arroyo De La Miel
description:
Free camper space for up to 72 hours + Dump area

Usually full, but during the winter a lot of people are staying much longer. Also, you can park everywhere where you can find the parking spot in the park. Look google satellite for better view. 

Beach 500 meters away. Restaurants, laundry , grouseries stores are nearby. 

It is strictly forbidden to place tables and chairs.

Partial parking ban from Tuesday 9:00 p.m. to Wednesday 6:00 p.m. due to the market!

name: The Venue
description:
Safe bike parking.
Hot showers.
Good Wi-Fi.
€16 in late December

name: Parking space with nice view
description: Its a Parking space with a nice view. Dirt road to get there. Busy in the morning

name: Camping Alta Ribagorça
description: Small, friendly mountain campsite with nice bungalows near the national park. It is a very quiet and cozy place with restaurant service

name: Sport Arena
description: You can tent under the sport arena, I was told so by the locals when looking go for a refuge for the night. It’s big and shelter you from t he elements. There’s a few taps for water in the village

name: Refugi forestal de cabanella
description: Nice spot with an amazing view over the valley. Next to a mountain hut. Water also available.

name: Benalmadena
description: Several big parking lots for overnight. Lowest have a dump for toilet and grey water and fresh water to fill-up your tank. Space for >200 campers. Only on thuesday from 9 pm till Wednesday end afternoon you can't stay here because a big market on all the spots on Wednesday. Then you may park in one of the streets.Only the lower were the dump is is open the whole week. Lot of restaurants and shops and 400 m to the coast and directly beside a beautiful park with gyms. Wifi in the library
